src: "We now have 4-month-old mice that are non-diabetic that used to be diabetic," he added.
tgt: Yongeyeho ati "ubu dufite impene z'amezi ane zitagira diyabete zari zifite diyabete".

src: Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chair of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association cautioned that the research is still in its early days.
tgt: Dr. Ehud Ur, umwarimu wigisha ibijyanye n'ubuvuzi muri Kaminuza ya Dalhousie i Halifax muri Nouvelle-Écosse, akaba n'umuyobozi w'ishami ry'ubuvuzi n'ubuhanga mu bya siyansi ry'Ishyirahamwe ry'Abanduye Icyorezo cya Diyabete ryo muri Kanada, yatanze umuburo w'uko ibyo bushakashatsi bikiri mu ntangiriro.

src: Like some other experts, he is skeptical about whether diabetes can be cured, noting that these findings have no relevance to people who already have Type 1 diabetes.
tgt: Kimwe n'abandi bahanga bamwe na bamwe, na we ntiyemera ko indwara ya diyabete ishobora gukira, kandi avuga ko ibyo bashyize ahagaragara bitagira icyo bimariye abantu bafite indwara ya diyabete yo mu bwoko bwa 1.

src: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him.
tgt: Ku wa mbere, Sara Danius, umunyamabanga w'igihe cyose w'Inama ya Nobel mu by'Ubumenyi mu Ishuri ry'u Suwede, yatangaje ku mugaragaro mu kiganiro cya Radiyo ya Sveriges Radio mu Suwede, ko komite, kubera ko itashoboraga kugera kuri Bob Dylan mu buryo butaziguye ku byerekeye gutsinda igihembo cya Nobel mu by'Ubumenyi mu mwaka wa 2016, yari yaretse imihati yo kumugezaho.

src: Danius said, "Right now we are doing nothing. I have called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and received very friendly replies. For now, that is certainly enough."
tgt: Danius yagize ati " Kugeza ubu nta kintu na kimwe dukora. Naramuhamagaye kandi nkamwandikira ubutumwa kuri email umufasha we wa hafi cyane kandi nabonye ibisubizo byiza cyane. Kuri ubu, ibyo ni byo bihagije".

src: Previously, Ring's CEO, Jamie Siminoff, remarked the company started when his doorbell wasn't audible from his shop in his garage.
tgt: Mbere yaho, umuyobozi mukuru wa Ring, Jamie Siminoff, yavuze ko uru ruganda rwatangiye igihe urugi rwe rutari rwumvikana mu iduka rye riri muri garage ye.

src: He built a WiFi door bell, he said.
tgt: Yavuze ko yubatse urumuri rw'inyuma y'irembo rufite Wi-Fi.

src: Siminoff said sales boosted after his 2013 appearance in a Shark Tank episode where the show panel declined funding the startup.
tgt: Siminoff yavuze ko ibicuruzwa byazamutse nyuma yo kugaragara mu mwaka wa 2013 mu gice cya Shark Tank aho abahagarariye iki gitaramo banze gutanga inkunga yo gutangira.

src: In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on shopping television channel QVC.
tgt: Mu mpera za 2017, Siminoff yagaragaye kuri televiziyo QVC.

src: Ring also settled a lawsuit with competing security company, the ADT Corporation.
tgt: Ring kandi yageze ku masezerano y'urukiko n'ikigo cy'umutekano cya ADT Corporation, cyari gikina.

src: While one experimental vaccine appears able to reduce Ebola mortality, up until now, no drugs have been clearly demonstrated suitable for treating existing infection.
tgt: N'ubwo urukingo rumwe rukiri mu igeragezwa rwerekana ko rushobora kugabanya umubare w'abahitanwa na Ebola, kugeza ubu, nta miti yagaragaye neza ko ikwiriye kuvura ubwandu buriho.

src: One antibody cocktail, ZMapp, initially showed promise in the field, but formal studies indicated it had less benefit than sought in preventing death.
tgt: Kimwe mu bikoresho by'imiti irwanya ubwandu, ZMapp, mu ntangiriro cyagaragaye ko ari cyiza, ariko ubushakashatsi bwakozwe bwagaragaje ko nta nyungu ifite mu kwirinda urupfu nk'uko byari byitezwe.

src: In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as a control, meaning scientists used it as a baseline and compared the three other treatments to it.
tgt: Mu igerageza rya PALM, ZMapp yakoreshejwe nk'uburyo bwo kugenzura, bisobanuye ko abahanga mu bya siyansi bayikoresheje nk'uburyo bwo kugenzura no kugereranya izindi miti eshatu na yo.

src: USA Gymnastics supports the United States Olympic Committee's letter and accepts the absolute need of the Olympic family to promote a safe environment for all of our athletes.
tgt: Ishyirahamwe ry'umukino wa Gymnastics muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe z'Amerika ryashyigikiye ibaruwa ya Komite Olempike yo muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe z'Amerika kandi ryemera ko umuryango w'imikino ya Olempike ukeneye cyane guteza imbere ahantu hatekanye ho abakinnyi bacu bose.

src: We agree with the USOC's statement that the interests of our athletes and clubs, and their sport, may be better served by moving forward with meaningful change within our organization, rather than decertification.
tgt: Turemeranya n'ibyavuzwe na USOC ko inyungu z'abakinnyi bacu n'amakipe yacu, hamwe n'imikino yabo, zishobora gukoreshwa neza kurushaho mu gutera imbere n'ihinduka ry'ingirakamaro mu ishyirahamwe ryacu, aho gucibwa umudari.

src: USA Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that may shine light on how abuse of the proportion described so courageously by the survivors of Larry Nassar could have gone undetected for so long and embraces any necessary and appropriate changes.
tgt: Ishyirahamwe ry'imikino y'ibinyabiziga muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe z'Amerika (USA Gymnastics) ryashyigikiye ko hakorwa iperereza rifite ubwigenge rigamije kureba uko abantu barokotse urupfu rwa Larry Nassar bashobora kuba baragize ubutwari bwo gusebanya ku rugero rwagaragajwe n'abari barokotse urupfu rwa Larry Nassar mu gihe kirekire, kandi rikemera ko habaho ihinduka rikenewe kandi rikwiriye.

src: USA Gymnastics and the USOC have the same goal - making the sport of gymnastics, and others, as safe as possible for athletes to follow their dreams in a safe, positive and empowered environment.
tgt: Ishyirahamwe ry'imikino ya Gymnastics muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe z'Amerika (USA Gymnastics) n'Ishyirahamwe ry'imikino ya Olympic muri Amerika (USOC) bifite intego imwe, ni ukuvuga gutuma imikino y'imikino ya Gymnastics n'indi mikino itari iy'imikino itari iy'imikino itari iy'imikino itari iy'imikino itari iy'imikino itari iy'imikino itari iy'imikino itari iy'imikino itari iy'imikino.

src: Throughout 1960s, Brzezinski worked for John F. Kennedy as his advisor and then the Lyndon B. Johnson administration.
tgt: Mu myaka ya 1960, Brzezinski yakoranye na John F. Kennedy nk'umujyanama we, hanyuma na Lyndon B. Johnson.

src: During the 1976 selections he advised Carter on foreign policy, then served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger.
tgt: Mu gihe cy'amatora yo mu mwaka wa 1976, yagiriye inama Carter ku byerekeye politiki y'amahanga, nyuma aza kuba Umujyanama mu by'umutekano w'igihugu (NSA) kuva mu mwaka wa 1977 kugeza mu wa 1981, asimbuye Henry Kissinger .

src: As NSA, he assisted Carter in diplomatically handling world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing US-China relations thought the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion in Afghanistan, 1979.
tgt: Nk'umuyobozi wa NSA, yafashije Carter mu bijyanye na dipolomasi mu gukemura ibibazo by'isi, nk'amasezerano ya Camp David yo mu mwaka wa 1978; gusubiza mu buryo busanzwe umubano w'Amerika n'Ubushinwa mu mpera z'imyaka ya 1970; Revolisiyo yo muri Irani, yatumye haba ikibazo cy'imfungwa zo muri Irani, mu mwaka wa 1979; n'igitero cya Sovieti muri Afghanistan, mu mwaka wa 1979.

src: The movie, featuring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories.
tgt: Iyi filimi, irimo Ryan Gosling na Emma Stone, yahawe ibihembo mu byiciro byose by'ingenzi.

src: Gosling and Stone received nominations for Best Actor and Actress respectively.
tgt: Gosling na Stone bahawe ibihembo bya Best Actor na Actress.

src: The other nominations include Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film-editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay.
tgt: Ibindi bihembo birimo Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film-editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing na Original Screenplay.

src: Two songs from the movie, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, received nominations for best original song. Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations - more than any other studio.
tgt: Indirimbo ebyiri zo muri iyi filime, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) na City of Stars, zarashyizwe ku rutonde rw'indirimbo nziza kurusha izindi. Ikigo cya Lionsgate cyashyizwe ku rutonde rw'indirimbo 26.

src: Late on Sunday, the United States President Donald Trump, in a statement delivered via the press secretary, announced US troops would be leaving Syria.
tgt: Mu ijoro ryo ku cyumweru, Perezida wa Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika Donald Trump, mu itangazo yashyize ahagaragara binyuze ku muyobozi w'itangazamakuru, yatangaje ko ingabo za Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika zizava muri Syria.

src: The announcement was made after Trump had a phone conversation with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.
tgt: Ubwo butumwa bwatangajwe nyuma y'aho Trump yavuganye kuri telefoni na Perezida wa Turukiya Recep Tayyip Erdogan.

src: Turkey would also take over guarding captured ISIS fighters which, the statement said, European nations have refused to repatriate.
tgt: Turukiya na yo izajya irinda abarwanyi ba ISIS bafashwe, nk'uko itangazo ryavuze, ibihugu by'i Burayi byaranze kubisubiza mu bihugu byabo.

src: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory already widespread, but provides details fossils generally cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement.
tgt: Ibyo ntibigaragaza gusa ko nibura zimwe mu nyamaswa zo mu bwoko bwa dinosaure zari zifite amababa, nk'uko abantu benshi babivuga, ahubwo birerekana n'ibindi bintu inyamaswa z'amabuye y'agaciro zitari zifite, urugero nk'amabara yazo n'uburyo zari zishyushye mu buryo butatu.

src: . Scientists say this animal's plumage was chestnut-brown on top with a pale or carotenoid-colored underside.
tgt: Abahanga bavuga ko amababa y'iyi nyamaswa yari afite ibara ry'ubururu ryijimye hejuru, n'urundi ruhande rukaba rwari rufite ibara ryijimye munsi.

src: The find also grants insight into the evolution of feathers in birds.
tgt: Ibyo bintu byabonetse kandi bitumenyesha ukuntu amababa y'inyoni yahindutse.

src: Because the dinosaur feathers do not have a well-developed shaft, called a rachis, but do have other features of feathers - barbs and barbules - the researchers inferred the rachis was likely a later evolutionary development that these other features.
tgt: Kubera ko amababa y'izo nyamaswa atari afite uruhu rwizewe neza, ariko akaba afite ibindi bintu byerekana ko ari amababa, urugero nk'amababa n'amababa, abashakashatsi bavuze ko bishoboka ko uruhu rw'uruhu rwizewe rwaturutse ku bwihindurize bwabayeho nyuma y'ibindi bintu.

src: The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.
tgt: Abashakashatsi bavuze ko nubwo uwo ari umurizo w'inyamaswa yitwa dinosaure yari ikiri muto, uwo mugani ugaragaza ko ari umuriro w'umuntu mukuru, atari uwo w'umwana w'intama.

src: The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.
tgt: Abashakashatsi bavuze ko n'ubwo uwo ari umurizo w'inyamaswa yitwa dinosaure yari ikiri muto, uwo muco ugaragaza amababa y'umuntu mukuru, aho kugaragaza amababa y'inkoko.

src: A car bomb detonated at police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey yesterday morning killed two police officers and injured more than twenty other people.
tgt: Igisasu cyaturikiye mu modoka mu biro by'igipolisi i Gaziantep, muri Turukiya ejo mu gitondo cyishe abapolisi babiri, abandi barenga makumyabiri barakomereka .

src: The governor's office said nineteen of the injured were police officers.
tgt: Ibiro bya guverineri byatangaje ko 19 mu bakomeretse ari abapolisi.

src: Police said they suspect an alleged Daesh (ISIL) militant of responsibility for the attack.
tgt: Igipolisi cyavuze ko gihamya ko ari umutwe w'iterabwoba wa Daesh (ISIL) wagabye icyo gitero.

src: They found the Sun operated on the same basic principles as other stars: The activity of all stars in the system was found to be driven by their luminosity, their rotation, and nothing else.
tgt: Basanze izuba rikora hakurikijwe amahame amwe n'ay'izindi nyenyeri, ni ukuvuga ko ibikorwa by'inyenyeri zose ziri muri uwo mubumbe byaterwa n'umucyo wazo, n'uko zigenda zizunguruka, nta kindi.

src: The luminosity and rotation are used together to determine a star's Rossby number, which is related to plasma flow.
tgt: Urumuri n'igihindukiro by'inyenyeri bikoreshwa hamwe mu kumenya umubare wa Rossby w'inyenyeri, wifitaniye isano n'umusaruro wa plasma.

src: The smaller the Rossby number, the less active the star with respect to magnetic reversals.
tgt: Uko umubare wa Rossby ari muto, ni na ko inyenyeri idakora cyane mu birebana no guhinduka kw'imirasire y'umuvuduko.

src: During his trip, Iwasaki ran into trouble on many occasions.
tgt: Mu gihe cy'urugendo rwe, Iwasaki yahuye n'ibibazo kenshi.

src: He was robbed by pirates, attacked in Tibet by a rabid dog, escaped marriage in Nepal and was arrested in India.
tgt: Yafashwe n'abambuzi b'inyanja, mu gihugu cya Tibet yarashwe n'imbwa y'inkoramaraso, mu gihugu cya Népal yahunze gushyingirwa, mu Buhindi na ho afatwa.

src: The 802.11n standard operates on both the 2.4Ghz and 5.0Ghz frequencies.
tgt: Ibipimo bya 802.11n bikora kuri 2.4Ghz na 5.0Ghz frequencies.

src: This will allow it to be backwards compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, provided that the base station has dual radios.
tgt: Ibi bizamufasha gukorana neza na 802.11a, 802.11b na 802.11g, mu gihe station ya base ifite radiyo ebyiri.

src: The speeds of 802.11n are substantially faster than that of its predecessors with a maximum theoretical throughput of 600Mbit/s.
tgt: Umuvuduko wa 802.11n ni munini cyane ugereranyije n'uw'abakurikiyeho bafite ubushobozi bwo kugera kuri 600Mbit/s.

src: Duvall, who is married with two adult children, did not leave a big impression on Miller, to whom the story was related.
tgt: Duvall, ufite umugore n'abana babiri bakuze, ntiyatunguye Miller cyane, kuko ari we wavuzwe iyo nkuru.

src: When asked for comment, Miller said, "Mike talks a lot during the hearing...I was getting ready so I wasn't really hearing what he was saying."
tgt: Igihe bamubazaga icyo avuga, Miller yagize ati "Mike avuga byinshi mu gihe cy'urubanza... nari niteguye, ku buryo ntumvaga neza ibyo yavugaga".

src: "We will endeavour to cut carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a notable margin by 2020 from the 2005 level," Hu said.
tgt: Hu yagize ati "Tuzagerageza kugabanya umwotsi wa CO2 ugereranyije n'umutungo mbumbe w'igihugu ku kigero kizaboneka mu mwaka wa 2020 ugereranyije n'umwaka wa 2005".

src: He did not set a figure for the cuts, saying they will be made based on China's economic output.
tgt: Ntiyatangaje umubare w'abazacibwa, avuga ko bazacibwa hashingiwe ku bikorwa by'ubukungu bw'Ubushinwa.

src: Hu encouraged developing countries "to avoid the old path of polluting first and cleaning up later."
tgt: Hu yateye inkunga ibihugu bikiri mu nzira y'amajyambere kugira ngo "bizibukire inzira ya kera yo kubanza kwangiza ibidukikije hanyuma bikaza gukosora".

src: He added that "they should not, however, be asked to take on obligations that go beyond their development stage, responsibility and capabilities."
tgt: Yongeyeho ati "ariko ntibagombye gusaba ko bahabwa inshingano zirenze urugero, inshingano n'ubushobozi bwabo".

src: The Iraq Study Group presented its report at 12.00 GMT today.
tgt: Itsinda ry'Abashakashatsi bo muri Iraki ryashyize ahagaragara raporo yaryo ku isaha ya saa kumi n'ebyiri z'umugoroba muri iki gihe.

src: It warns No one can guarantee that any course of action in Iraq at this point will stop sectarian warfare, growing violence, or a slide toward chaos.
tgt: Icyo kinyamakuru gitanga umuburo ugira uti "nta muntu n'umwe ushobora gutanga icyizere cy'uko ikintu icyo ari cyo cyose kizakorwa muri Iraki muri iki gihe, kizarinda intambara z'amatsinda, urugomo rukomeje kwiyongera, cyangwa imvururu.

src: The Report opens with plea for open debate and the formation of a consensus in the United States about the policy towards the Middle East.
tgt: Raporo itangira n'isengesho ry'ibiganiro by'umwimerere no gushyirwaho kwumvikana muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe z'Amerika ku byerekeye politiki yo mu Burasirazuba bwo Hagati.

src: The Report is highly critical of almost every aspect of the present policy of the Executive towards Iraq and it urges an immediate change of direction.
tgt: Iyo Raporo irashyigikira cyane hafi ya buri gice cya politiki y'ubutegetsi kuri Iraki kandi isaba ko habaho ihinduka ry'ubuyobozi vuba aha.

src: First among its 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be taken before the end of this year to secure Iraq's borders against hostile interventions and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.
tgt: Icya mbere mu mabwiriza yayo 78 ni uko mbere y'uko uyu mwaka urangira hagomba gushyirwaho icyemezo gishya cya dipolomasi kugira ngo imipaka y'Iraqi ikingwe n'ibitero by'intagondwa no kugarura imishyikirano ya dipolomasi n'ibihugu bibanyi.

src: Current senator and Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy yesterday evening in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires.
tgt: Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner uri muri Sena akaba n'umugore wa mbere wa Argentine, yatangaje ko agiye kwiyamamariza kuba perezida ejo mu ijoro i La Plata, umujyi uri ku birometero 50 uvuye mu mujyi wa Buenos Aires

src: Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, the same location she used to start her 2005 campaign for the Senate as member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.
tgt: Madamu Kirchner yatangaje umugambi we wo kwiyamamariza kuba perezida ku kibuga cy'imikino cya Argentine, ari na ho yatangiriye ibikorwa bye byo kwiyamamariza kuyobora inteko ishinga amategeko mu mwaka wa 2005 nk'umwe mu bayobozi b'intara ya Buenos Aires.

src: The debate was sparked by controversy over spending on relief and reconstruction in the wake Hurricane Katrina; which some fiscal conservatives have humorously labeled "Bush's New Orleans Deal."
tgt: Urwo rubanza rwatangijwe n'ikibazo cy'amafaranga yakoreshejwe mu gufasha no gusana nyuma y'umuyaga ukomeye wa Katrina; bamwe mu bashyigikiye ingengo y'imari bayise mu buryo bw'agatsiko ko ari "amasezerano ya New Orleans ya Bush".

src: Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort has focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to perceived Washington insiders.
tgt: Abatavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi bagaragaje impungenge ku bikorwa byo gusana byibandaga ku gutanga amasezerano yo gusana ku bantu babonaga ko bari muri Washington.

src: Over four million people went to Rome to attend the funeral.
tgt: Abantu basaga miriyoni enye bagiye i Roma kugira ngo baje mu muhango wo kumuzika.

src: The number of people present was so large that it was not possible for everybody to gain access to the funeral in St. Peter's Square.
tgt: Umubare w'abantu bari bahari wari munini cyane ku buryo bitashobokaga ko umuntu wese yashoboraga kujya mu muhango wo kumushyingura muri St. Peter's Square.

src: Several large television screens were installed in various places in Rome to let the people watch the ceremony.
tgt: Mu bice bitandukanye by'i Roma, hashyizweho za televiziyo nini nyinshi kugira ngo abantu babone kureba uwo muhango.

src: In many other cities of Italy and in the rest of the world, particularly in Poland, similar setups were made, which were viewed by a great number of people.
tgt: Mu yindi mijyi myinshi yo mu Butaliyani no mu bindi bice by'isi, cyane cyane muri Polonye, habayeho ibirori nk'ibyo, abantu benshi bakaba barabibonye.

src: Historians have criticized past FBI policies for focusing resources on cases which are easy to solve, especially stolen car cases, with the intent of boosting the agency's success rate.
tgt: Abahanga mu by'amateka banenze politiki za FBI zo mu bihe byahise kubera ko yashyiraga imbaraga mu bibazo byoroshye gukemurwa, cyane cyane ibibazo by'imodoka zibwa, mu ntumbero yo kuzamura umubare w'abatsinze.

src: Congress began funding the obscenity initiative in fiscal 2005 and specified that the FBI must devote 10 agents to adult pornography.
tgt: Inteko Ishinga Amategeko yatangiye gushyigikira gahunda yo kurwanya amashusho y'urukozasoni mu mwaka w'ingengo y'imari wa 2005 maze igaragaza ko FBI yagombaga gushyiraho abakozi 10 bo kurwanya amashusho y'urukozasoni agaragaza abantu bakuze.

src: Robin Uthappa made the innings highest score, 70 runs in just 41 balls by hitting 11 fours and 2 sixes.
tgt: Robin Uthappa yatsinze ibitego byinshi kurusha abandi, 70 mu mikino 41 gusa mu gutsinda ibitego 11 bya 4 na 2.

src: Middle order batsmen, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, performed well and made a hundred-run partnership.
tgt: Abakinnyi b'ibikombe by'imbere, Sachin Tendulkar na Rahul Dravid, bakoze neza kandi bakoranye umukino w'ibitego ijana.

src: But, after losing the captain's wicket India only made 36 runs loosing 7 wickets to end the innings.
tgt: Ariko, nyuma yo gutakaza umupira wa kapiteni, u Buhinde bwatsinze ibitego 36 gusa, butakaza umupira 7 mu mikino yo kurangiza.

src: U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore the morning of November 16, beginning a week-long tour of Asia.
tgt: Perezida wa Leta Zunze Ubumwe z'Amerika George W. Bush yageze muri Singapour mu gitondo cyo ku itariki ya 16 Ugushyingo, atangira urugendo rw'icyumweru mu karere ka Aziya.

src: He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed trade and terrorism issues with the Singapore Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong.
tgt: Yasuwe na Minisitiri w'Intebe w'u Singapore, Wong Kan Seng, kandi baganiriye ku bibazo by'ubucuruzi n'iterabwoba na Minisitiri w'Intebe w'u Singapore, Lee Hsien Loong .

src: After a week of losses in the midterm election, Bush told an audience about the expansion of trade in Asia.
tgt: Nyuma y'icyumweru cyose atsinzwe mu matora yo hagati mu gihe, Bush yabwiye abari bamuteze amatwi iby'iterambere ry'ubucuruzi muri Aziya.

src: Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's 'Clean Air Act' to an all-party committee for review, before its second reading, after Tuesday's 25 minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO.
tgt: Minisitiri w'Intebe Stephen Harper yemeye kohereza 'Itegeko ry'Umwuka Udahumanye' rya guverinoma muri komite y'amashyaka yose kugira ngo risuzume, mbere yo gusomwa ku ncuro ya kabiri, nyuma y'inama y'iminota 25 yabaye ku wa Kabiri n'umuyobozi wa NDP Jack Layton muri PMO.

src: Layton had asked for changes to the conservatives' environmental bill during the meeting with the PM, asking for a "thorough and complete rewriting" of the Conservative party's environmental bill.
tgt: Layton yari yasabye ko hashyirwaho impinduka mu itegeko rigenga ibidukikije ry'ishyaka ry'abatavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi mu gihe yari ahuriye na Minisitiri w'Intebe, asaba ko itegeko rigenga ibidukikije ry'ishyaka ry'abatavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi "ryongera kwandikwa mu buryo bwuzuye kandi bwimbitse".

src: Ever since the Federal Government stepped in to take over funding of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised this act as a stunt in the prelude to the federal election to be called by November.
tgt: Kuva Guverinoma y'u Rwanda itangira gushyigikira ibitaro bya Mersey i Devonport muri Tasmania, Guverinoma y'intara ndetse n'abadepite bamwe na bamwe bo mu nteko ishinga amategeko y'u Rwanda bagaragaje ko icyo gikorwa ari ikinyoma cyakozwe mbere y'amatora ateganyijwe mu Ugushyingo.

src: But Prime Minister John Howard has said the act was only to safeguard the facilities of the hospital from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, in giving an extra AUD$45 million.
tgt: Ariko Minisitiri w'Intebe John Howard yavuze ko icyo cyemezo cyari kigamije kurinda gusa ibitaro ko leta ya Tasmanian itazisubiza inyuma, mu gutanga miliyoni 45 z'amadolari ya AUD.

src: According to the latest bulletin, sea level readings indicated a tsunami was generated. There was some definite tsunami activity recorded near Pago Pago and Niue.
tgt: Dukurikije itangazo rya vuba aha, ibipimo by'ubushyuhe bw'inyanja byerekanye ko habayeho tsunami.

src: No major damage or injuries have been reported in Tonga, but power was temporarily lost, which reportedly prevented Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning issued by the PTWC.
tgt: Nta ngaruka zikomeye cyangwa ibikomere byatangajwe muri Tonga, ariko amashanyarazi yarabuze mu gihe gito, bikaba byaratumye abayobozi ba Tonga batabona umuburo wa tsunami watangajwe na PTWC.

src: Fourteen schools in Hawaii located on or near coastlines were closed all of Wednesday despite the warnings being lifted.
tgt: Amashuri 14 yo muri Hawaii ari hafi y'inyanja yafunzwe ku wa gatatu w'icyumweru gishize, n'ubwo ibi byemezo byahagaritswe.

src: U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement.
tgt: Perezida wa Leta Zunze Ubumwe z'Amerika, George W. Bush, yashimye ubwo butangazo.

src: Bush spokesman Gordon Johndroe called North Korea's pledge "a major step towards the goal of achieving the verifiable denuclearization of the Korean peninsula."
tgt: Umuvugizi wa Perezida Bush, Gordon Johndroe, yavuze ko ibyo Koreya ya Ruguru yasezeranye ari "intambwe y'ingenzi mu kugera ku ntego yo gukuraho ibirwanisho bya kirimbuzi bya kirimbuzi mu gice cya Koreya".

src: The tenth named storm of the Atlantic Hurricane season, Subtropical Storm Jerry, formed in the Atlantic Ocean today.
tgt: Umuyaga ugira icumi witwa Subtropical Storm Jerry, wabaye muri iki gihe mu nyanja ya Atlantiki.

src: The National Hurricane Center (NHC) says that at this point Jerry poses no threat to land.
tgt: Ikigo cy'igihugu gishinzwe iby'ibihuha (NHC) kivuga ko muri iki gihe icyorezo cya Jerry kitagira icyo kigeraho.

src: The U.S. Corps of Engineers estimated that 6 inches of rainfall could breach the previously damaged levees.
tgt: Abashakashatsi bo muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe z'Amerika bagereranyije ko imvura y'uburebure bwa santimetero eshatu ishobora gusenya imiyoboro y'amazi yari yarangiritse.

src: The Ninth Ward, which saw flooding as high as 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, is currently in waist-high water as the nearby levee was overtopped.
tgt: Icyicaro cya cyenda, cyabonye imyuzure y'uburebure bwa metero 20 mu gihe cy'umuyaga w'umuyaga Katrina, ubu kiri mu mazi y'uburebure bw'uburebure kubera ko uruzitiro ruri hafi yarwo rwari rwarasenywe.

src: Water is spilling over the levee in a section 100 feet wide.
tgt: Amazi arimo asuka mu gice gifite uburebure bwa metero 100.

src: Commons Administrator Adam Cuerden expressed his frustration over the deletions when he spoke to Wikinews last month.
tgt: Umuyobozi wa Commons, Adam Cuerden, yagaragaje agahinda ke ku bijyanye n'ibyo gukurwaho igihe yavuganaga na Wikinews mu kwezi gushize.

src: "He [Wales] basically lied to us from the start. First, by acting as if this was for legal reasons. Second, by pretending he was listening to us, right up to his art deletion."
tgt: Yagize ati "mu by'ukuri, [Wales] yatubeshye kuva mu ntangiriro: ubwa mbere, mu gukora nk'aho ibyo yari abifitiye impamvu zemewe n'amategeko. Icya kabiri, mu kwiyerekana ko atutega amatwi, kugeza ubwo yazimya amashusho".

src: The community irritation led to current efforts to draft a policy regarding sexual content for the site which hosts millions of openly-licensed media.
tgt: Gucika intege kw'abaturage byatumye habaho imihati yo kwandika politiki yerekeye ibikubiye mu mibonano mpuzabitsina kuri uru rubuga rufite imbuga z'itangazamakuru zigera kuri miriyoni zifite ibyangombwa byemewe.

src: The work done was mostly theoretical, but the program was written to simulate observations made of the Sagittarius galaxy.
tgt: Igikorwa cyakozwe ahanini cyari icy'ubuvanganzo, ariko porogaramu yaranditswe kugira ngo isuzume ibipimo byatanzwe n'abahanga ku byerekeye umugungagonga Sagittarius.

src: The effect the team was looking for would be caused by tidal forces between the galaxy's dark matter and the Milky Way's dark matter.
tgt: Icyo itsinda ry'abashakashatsi ryashakaga kumenya, ni uko ibyo bintu byaturukaga ku bintu by'umwijima biri hagati y'iyo mibumbe ya Milky Way n'ibindi.

src: Just like the moon exerts a pull on the earth, causing tides, so does the Milky Way exert a force on the Sagittarius galaxy.
tgt: Kimwe n'uko ukwezi gukwegera isi, bigatuma habaho ibihuha n'ibihuha, ni na ko umugwi w'inyenyeri wa Milky Way ukwegera umugwi w'inyenyeri wa Sagittarius.

src: The scientists were able to conclude that the dark matter affect other dark matter in the same way regular matter does.
tgt: Abahanga bashoboye kugera ku mwanzuro w'uko ibintu by'umwijima bigira ingaruka ku bindi bintu by'umwijima mu buryo bumwe n'uko ibintu bisanzwe bigira.

src: This theory says that most dark matter around a galaxy is located around a galaxy in a kind of halo, and is made of lots of small particles.
tgt: Iyo nyigisho ivuga ko igice kinini cy'ibinyabuzima by'umwijima bikikije isanzure ry'inyenyeri giherereye mu isanzure ry'iyo isanzure, kandi ko bigizwe n'ibice by'ibinyabuzima bike cyane.

src: Television reports show white smoke coming from the plant.
tgt: Amakuru yo kuri televiziyo agaragaza umwotsi w'umweru uturuka muri iyo nyubako.

src: Local authorities are warning residents in the vicinity of the plant to stay indoors, turn off air-conditioners and not to drink tap water.
tgt: Abategetsi b'aho batuye baragabisha abaturage batuye hafi y'iyo sosiyete ko bagomba kuguma mu ngo zabo, guhagarika ibyuma bihumanya ikirere no kwirinda kunywa amazi yo mu mifuka y'amazi.

src: According to Japan's nuclear agency, radioactive caesium and iodine has been identified at the plant.
tgt: Dukurikije uko Ishami ry'Ubuyapani rishinzwe ibirwanisho bya nikleyeri ribivuga, muri icyo kigo cyabonetse caesium n'iyodine byanduza amashanyarazi.

src: Authorities speculate that this indicates that containers holding uranium fuel at the site may have ruptured and are leaking.
tgt: Abategetsi batekereza ko ibi bigaragaza ko ibicuruzwa by'ibikomoka kuri uranium byo muri ako gace bishobora kuba byaravunitse kandi bikaba birimo guturika.

src: Dr. Tony Moll discovered the Extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the South African region KwaZulu-Natal.
tgt: Dr. Tony Moll yavumbuye icyorezo cya TB (XDR-TB) mu ntara ya KwaZulu-Natal yo muri Afurika y'Epfo.

src: In an interview, he said the new variant was "very highly troubling and alarming because of the very high fatality rate."
tgt: Mu kiganiro yagiranye n'itangazamakuru, yavuze ko iyi virusi nshya "yateye impungenge cyane kandi iteye ubwoba bitewe n'umubare munini cyane w'abantu bapfa".

src: Some patients might have contracted the bug in the hospital, Dr. Moll thinks, and at least two were hospital health workers.
tgt: Dr. Moll avuga ko hari abarwayi bashobora kuba baranduye iyo virusi mu bitaro, kandi nibura babiri muri bo bari abakozi bo mu bitaro.

src: In one year's time, an infected person may infect 10 to 15 close contacts.
tgt: Mu gihe cy'umwaka umwe, umuntu ufite iyo ndwara ashobora kwandurira abantu 10 kugeza kuri 15 bari hafi ye.

src: However, the percentage of XDR-TB in the entire group of people with tuberculosis still seems to be low; 6,000 of the total 330,000 people infected at any particular moment in South Africa.
tgt: Icyakora, umubare w'abanduye XDR-TB mu itsinda ry'abantu bose barwaye iki cyorezo, usa n'aho ari muto; abantu 6,000 ku bantu 330,000 banduye iki cyorezo mu gihe runaka muri Afurika y'Epfo.

src: The satellites, both of which weighed in excess of 1,000 pounds, and traveling at approximately 17,500 miles per hour, collided 491 miles above the Earth.
tgt: Izo sateliti zombi zari zifite uburemere burenga ibilo 900, kandi zari zifite umuvuduko w'ibirometero bigera ku 17.500 ku isaha, zahuye ziri hejuru y'Isi ku birometero 491.

src: Scientists say the explosion caused by the collision was massive.
tgt: Abahanga mu bya siyansi bavuga ko igitero cyatewe n'iyo ndege cyari gikomeye cyane.

src: They are still trying to determine just how large the crash was and how the Earth will be affected.
tgt: Kugeza ubu baracyagerageza kumenya ukuntu iyo mpanuka yari ikomeye n'uko isi izagira ingaruka zayo.

src: The United States Strategic Command of the U.S. Department of Defense office is tracking the debris.
tgt: Ikigo cya Leta Zunze Ubumwe z'Amerika gishinzwe kurinda igihugu cy'icyo gihugu kigenda kigenzura icyo kirimbuzi.

src: The result of plotting analysis will be posted to a public website.
tgt: Ibyavuye mu bushakashatsi bwakozwe bizashyirwa ku mbuga nkoranyambaga.

src: A doctor who worked at Children's Hospital of Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania will be charged with aggravated murder after her mother was found dead in the trunk of her car Wednesday, authorities in Ohio say.
tgt: Abategetsi bo muri Ohio bavuga ko umuganga wakoraga mu Bitaro by'abana byo muri Pittsburgh, muri Pennsylvania, azashinjwa ubwicanyi bukomeye nyuma y'aho nyina yabonetse yapfuye mu modoka ye ku wa gatatu.

src: Dr. Malar Balasubramanian, 29, was found in Blue Ash, Ohio, a suburb approximately 15 miles north of Cincinnati lying on the ground beside the road in a T-shirt and underwear in an apparently heavily medicated state.
tgt: Dr. Malar Balasubramanian w'imyaka 29, yabonetse mu mudugudu wa Blue Ash, muri Ohio, ku birometero bigera kuri 15 mu majyaruguru ya Cincinnati, aryamye ku butaka iruhande rw'inzira, yambaye ikanzu n'imyenda y'imbere, bisa n'aho yari arwaye cyane.

src: She directed officers to her black Oldsmobile Intrigue which was 500 feet away.
tgt: Yategetse abasirikare kujya mu modoka ye y'umweru yitwa Oldsmobile Intrigue, yari iri metero 500.

src: There, they found the body of Saroja Balasubramanian, 53, covered with blood-stained blankets.
tgt: Aho ni ho basanze umurambo wa Saroja Balasubramanian w'imyaka 53, wari wiganjemo udupfukamunwa tw'amaraso.

src: Police said that the body appeared to have been there for about a day.
tgt: Igipolisi cyavuze ko ikiziga cyasaga n'aho cyari kimaze umunsi kirimo kuba aho.

src: The first cases of the disease this season were reported in late July.
tgt: Abanduye ba mbere b'iki cyorezo muri iki gihe byatangajwe mu mpera za Nyakanga.

src: The disease is carried by pigs, which then migrates to humans through mosquitos.
tgt: Iyo ndwara ikwirakwizwa n'ingurube, hanyuma ikajya ku bantu binyuriye ku ndwara y'umusonga.

src: The outbreak has prompted the Indian government to undertake such measures as deployment of pig catchers in seriously affected areas, distributing thousands of mosquito curtains and spraying pesticides.
tgt: Iki cyorezo cyatumye leta y'u Buhinde ikora ingamba zirimo kohereza abarobyi b'ingurube mu turere twugarijwe cyane n'iki cyorezo, bagaburira abantu ibihumbi n'ibihumbi ibyuma bihumanya inyamaswa n'ibiyobyabwenge by'inzige.

src: Several million vials of encephalitis vaccine have also been promised by the government, which will help prepare health agencies for next year.
tgt: Guverinoma kandi yasezeranyije miliyoni nyinshi z'inkingo z'icyorezo cya encephalitis, zizafasha mu gutegura inzego z'ubuzima umwaka utaha.

src: Plans for vaccines to be delivered to the historically most affected areas this year were delayed due to lack of funds and low prioritisation relative to other diseases.
tgt: Imigambi yo kohereza inkingo mu turere twaranzwe n'icyorezo cyane muri uyu mwaka yahagaritswe bitewe n'uko nta mafaranga yari ahagije ndetse n'ubushyuhe buke bw'ibindi byorezo.

src: In 1956 Słania moved to Sweden, where three years later he began work for the Swedish Post Office and became their chief engraver.
tgt: Mu mwaka wa 1956, Słania yimukiye mu Busuwisi, maze nyuma y'imyaka itatu atangira gukora mu Biro by'Iposita byo mu Busuwisi, aba umwanditsi mukuru w'ibishushanyo by'iyo Biro.

src: He produced over 1,000 stamps for Sweden and 28 other countries.
tgt: Yafashije abantu bo mu Busuwisi no mu bindi bihugu 28 gukora amatariki asaga 1.000.

src: His work is of such recognized quality and detail that he is one of the very few "household names" among philatelists. Some specialize in collecting his work alone.
tgt: Ibikorwa bye ni byiza cyane kandi bifite ibisobanuro byimbitse ku buryo ari umwe mu bantu bake cyane "bazi izina rye" mu bakora ubucukuzi bw'ibitabo.

src: His 1,000th stamp was the magnificent "Great Deeds by Swedish Kings" by David Klöcker Ehrenstrahl in 2000, which is listed in the Guinness Book of World Records.
tgt: Ikidodo cye cya 1000 cyari icyitwa "Great Deeds by Swedish Kings" cyanditswe na David Klöcker Ehrenstrahl mu mwaka wa 2000, kikaba cyanditse mu gitabo cya Guinness Book of World Records.

src: He was also engaged in engraving banknotes for many countries, recent examples of his work including the Prime Ministerial portraits on the front of the new Canadian $5 and $100 bills.
tgt: Nanone kandi, yakoreshwaga mu gucapa amafaranga y'amabanki y'ibihugu byinshi, urugero rwa vuba aha rw'imirimo ye harimo n'amafoto y'abaminisitiri bakuru ku ruhande rw'imbere rw'amafaranga mashya ya $5 na $100 yo muri Canada.

src: After the accident occurred, Gibson was transported to a hospital but died shortly afterwards.
tgt: Nyuma y'iyo mpanuka, Gibson yajyanywe mu bitaro ariko nyuma y'igihe gito arapfa .

src: The truck driver, who is aged 64, was not injured in the crash.
tgt: Uwo mushoferi w'imodoka, ufite imyaka 64, ntiyakomeretse mu mpanuka.

src: The vehicle itself was taken away from the scene of the accident at approximately 1200 GMT on the same day.
tgt: Imodoka ubwayo yajyanywe aho habaye impanuka ahagana ku isaha ya 1200 GMT kuri uwo munsi.

src: A person working in a garage near where the accident occurred said: "There were children waiting to cross the road and they were all screaming and crying."
tgt: Hari umuntu wakoraga muri garage yari hafi y'aho iyo mpanuka yabereye, yaravuze ati "hari abana bari bategereje kuzambuka umuhanda, kandi bose bari barira".

src: They all ran back from where the accident had happened.
tgt: Bose bahise bahunga bava aho iyo mpanuka yari yabereye.

src: Other subjects on the agenda in Bali include saving the world's remaining forests, and sharing technologies to help developing nations grow in less-polluting ways.
tgt: Ibindi bibazo biri ku rutonde rw'ibiganiro bya Bali birimo kurinda amashyamba asigaye ku isi, no gusangira ikoranabuhanga mu gufasha ibihugu bikiri mu nzira y'amajyambere gukura mu buryo budahumanya ikirere.

src: The U.N. also hopes to finalize a fund to help countries affected by global warming to cope with the impacts.
tgt: Ishami ry'Umuryango w'Abibumbye ryiteze kandi gushyiraho ikigega kizafasha ibihugu byibasiwe n'icyorezo cy'ihindagurika ry'ubushyuhe mu isi guhangana n'ingaruka zacyo.

src: The money could go toward flood-proof houses, better water management, and crop diversification.
tgt: Ayo mafaranga yashoboraga gukoreshwa mu kubaka amazu atagira inzara, mu kubungabunga neza amazi no mu kongera ubwoko bw'ibikomoka ku masambu.

src: Fluke wrote that the efforts by some to drown out women from speaking out about women's health were unsuccessful.
tgt: Fluke yanditse ko imihati y'abantu bamwe na bamwe yo kubuza abagore kuvuga ku birebana n'ubuzima bw'abagore, yari itarangiye.

src: She came to this conclusion due to the multitude of positive comments and encouragement sent to her by both female and male individuals urging that contraception medication be considered a medical necessity.
tgt: Yageze kuri uwo mwanzuro bitewe n'amagambo menshi y'ibyishimo n'inkunga yahawe n'abantu b'abagore n'abagabo bashishikariza ko imiti yo kwirinda gusama ibonwa nk'ikintu gikenewe mu buvuzi.

src: When the fighting ceased after the wounded were transported to the hospital, about 40 of the other remaining inmates stayed in the yard and refused to return to their cells.
tgt: Igihe intambara yarangiraga, abari barakomeretse bamaze kujyanwa mu bitaro, abandi banyacyubahiro bagera kuri 40 bari basigaye bagumye mu rugo kandi banze gusubira mu mazu yabo.

src: Negotiators tried to rectify the situation, but the prisoners' demands are not clear.
tgt: Abari mu biganiro bagerageje gukemura icyo kibazo, ariko ibyo imfungwa zisaba ntibiramenyekana.

src: Between 10:00-11:00 pm MDT, a fire was started by the inmates in the yard.
tgt: Hagati ya saa kumi n'ebyiri n'icyenda z'umugoroba, imfungwa zari mu rugo rwanjye zarashyize umuriro.

src: Soon, officers equipped with riot gear entered the yard and cornered the inmates with tear gas.
tgt: Bidatinze, abasirikare bitwaje ibikoresho byo kurwanya imvururu binjiye muri iyo gereza, maze barasahura imyanda y'isasu ku bantu bari muri iyo gereza.

src: Fire rescue crews eventually doused the fire by 11:35 pm.
tgt: Abazimya umuriro bahise bazimya umuriro ku isaha ya 11:35 nimugoroba.

src: After the dam was built in 1963, the seasonal floods that would spread sediment throughout the river were halted.
tgt: Nyuma y'aho uwo mugezi wubatswe mu mwaka wa 1963, imyuzure y'igihe n'igihe yatumaga umugezi w'umugezi wose ukongoka, yarahagaritswe.

src: This sediment was necessary for creating sandbars and beaches, which served as wildlife habitats.
tgt: Iyo mivange yari ikenewe kugira ngo haboneke uturere tw'umusenyi n'utw'inyanja, aho inyamaswa zo mu ishyamba zari zisanzwe zibaho.

src: As a result, two fish species have become extinct, and two others have become endangered, including the humpback chub.
tgt: Ibyo byatumye ubwoko bubiri bw'amafi buzimira, n'ubundi bubiri bukaba buri mu kaga, hakubiyemo n'ubw'amafi yitwa humpback chub.

src: Although the water level will only rise a few feet after the flood, officials are hoping it will be enough to restore eroded sandbars downstream.
tgt: Nubwo amazi azazamukaho metero nke gusa nyuma y'umwuzure, abategetsi bafite ibyiringiro ko azahagije kugira ngo basubiremo uturere tw'umusenyi twavuyemo amazi.

src: No tsunami warning has been issued, and according to the Jakarta geophysics agency, no tsunami warning will be issued because the quake did not meet the magnitude 6.5 requirement.
tgt: Nta muburo wa tsunami watangajwe, kandi nk'uko byatangajwe n'ikigo cya Jakarta Geophysics, nta muburo wa tsunami uzatangazwa bitewe n'uko iyo nyamugigima idashoboye kugera ku kigero cya 6.5 gikenewe.

src: Despite there being no tsunami threat, residents started to panic and began to leave their businesses and homes.
tgt: Nubwo nta cyago cy'iyo tsunami cyari cyabayeho, abaturage batangiye guterwa ubwoba maze batangira kuva mu mazu yabo n'ibigo byabo by'ubucuruzi.

src: Although Winfrey was tearful in her farewell, she made it clear to her fans she will be back.
tgt: N'ubwo Winfrey yari afite amarira mu maso igihe yavugaga amagambo yo gutandukana n'abakunzi be, yabasobanuriye neza ko azagaruka.

src: "This is not going to be goodbye. This is the closing of one chapter and the opening of a new one."
tgt: Ati "Iki si igihe cyo guterana, ahubwo ni igihe cyo gusoza igice kimwe no gutangira gishya".

src: Final results from Namibian presidential and parliamentary elections have indicated that the incumbent president, Hifikepunye Pohamba, has been reelected by a large margin.
tgt: Ibyavuye mu matora y'umukuru w'igihugu n'ay'inteko ishinga amategeko muri Namibie byerekanye ko perezida w'icyo gihe, Hifikepunye Pohamba, yongeye gutorwa n'abantu benshi cyane.

src: The ruling party, South West Africa People's Organisation (SWAPO), also retained a majority in the parliamentary elections.
tgt: Ishyaka riri ku butegetsi, South West Africa People's Organisation (SWAPO), na ryo ryakomeje kugira umubare munini mu matora y'abadepite.

src: Coalition and Afghan troops moved into the area to secure the site and other coalition aircraft have been sent to assist.
tgt: Abasirikare ba Coalition n'aba Afuganistani bajyanywe muri ako karere kugira ngo barinde icyo kibanza, izindi ndege za Coalition nazo zatumwe kugira ngo zifashe.

src: The crash occurred high up in mountainous terrain, and is believed to have been the result of hostile fire.
tgt: Iyo mpanuka yabereye mu misozi, kandi bivugwa ko yaba yatewe n'umuriro w'abanzi.

src: Efforts to search for the crash site are being met by bad weather and harsh terrain.
tgt: Imirimo yo gushakisha aho iyo ndege yaguye iragereranywa n'imimerere mibi ndetse n'ubutaka bubi.

src: The medical charity Mangola, Medecines Sans Frontieres and the World Health Organisation say it is the worst outbreak recorded in the country.
tgt: Ishyirahamwe ry'ubuvuzi Mangola, Medecines Sans Frontieres n'Umuryango w'Abibumbye ryita ku buzima (OMS) bavuga ko iki ari cyo cyorezo kibi cyane cyabonetse muri iki gihugu.

src: Spokesman for Medecines Sans Frontiere Richard Veerman said: "Angola is heading for its worst ever outbreak and the situation remains very bad in Angola," he said.
tgt: Umuvugizi wa Medecines Sans Frontiere, Richard Veerman yagize ati: "Angola iri mu nzira yo guhangana n'icyorezo kibi kurusha ibindi kandi ibintu biracyari bibi cyane muri Angola".

src: The games kicked off at 10:00am with great weather and apart from mid morning drizzle which quickly cleared up, it was a perfect day for 7's rugby.
tgt: Imikino yatangijwe saa kumi z'amanywa mu gihe ikirere cyari cyiza kandi uretse imvura y'igicuku yahagurutse mu gitondo ikaza vuba, yari umunsi mwiza ku mukino wa rugby.

src: Tournament top seeds South Africa started on the right note when they had a comfortable 26 - 00 win against 5th seeded Zambia.
tgt: Igice cya mbere cya shampiyona cya Afurika y'Epfo cyatangiye mu buryo bwiza ubwo cyatsindaga Zambia ifite amanota 26 kuri 0.

src: Looking decidedly rusty in the game against their southern sisters, South Africa however steadily improved as the tournament progressed.
tgt: Afurika y'Epfo yagaragaye ko idakomeye cyane mu mukino yari yakinnye n'abakunzi bayo bo mu majyepfo, ariko uko imikino yagendaga ikomezaga kugenda irushaho kuba myiza.

src: Their disciplined defence, ball handling skills and excellent team work made them stand out and it was clear that this was the team to beat.
tgt: Kuba bariteguye neza mu myitozo yo kwirwanaho, ubuhanga bwabo bwo gufata umupira no gukora neza mu itsinda, byatumye batandukana kandi byari byumvikana ko ari bo ikipe yagombaga gutsindwa.

src: Officials for the city of Amsterdam and the Anne Frank Museum state that the tree is infected with a fungus and poses a public health hazard as they argue that it was in imminent danger of falling over.
tgt: Abategetsi b'umujyi wa Amsterdam n'abashinzwe kubungabunga inyubako ndangamurage ya Anne Frank bavuga ko icyo giti cyaranduwe n'uburozi kandi ko ari ikigeragezo ku buzima bw'abaturage, kuko bavuga ko cyari kiri mu kaga ko kugwa.

src: It had been scheduled to be cut down on Tuesday, but was saved after an emergency court ruling.
tgt: Byari biteganyijwe ko yacibwa ku wa Kabiri, ariko yarakijijwe nyuma y'itegeko ry'urukiko ryo mu buryo bw'icyorezo.

src: All of the cave entrances, which were named "The Seven Sisters," are at least 100 to 250 meters (328 to 820 feet) in diameter.
tgt: Inzira zose zo kwinjira muri iyo nyenga, zari zitwa "Abavandimwe barindwi", zari zifite uburebure bwa metero nibura 100 kugeza kuri 250 (328 kugeza kuri 820).

src: Infrared images show that the temperature variations from night and day show that they are likely caves.
tgt: Amashusho ya infrarouge agaragaza ko ubushyuhe buhinduka bitewe n'ijoro n'umunsi, bigaragaza ko bishobora kuba ari imisozi.

src: "They are cooler than the surrounding surface in the day and warmer at night.
tgt: Mu gihe cy'umunsi, iyo mihanda irahumeka cyane kurusha ahantu hari, naho mu gihe cy'ijoro igashyuha.

src: Their thermal behavior is not as steady as large caves on Earth that often maintain a fairly constant temperature, but it is consistent with these being deep holes in the ground," said Glen Cushing of the United States Geological Survey (USGS) Astrogeology Team and of Northern Arizona University located in Flagstaff, Arizona.
tgt: Glen Cushing wo mu kigo cya Leta Zunze Ubumwe z'Amerika gishinzwe ubushakashatsi mu by'ikirere (USGS) n'iyo muri Kaminuza ya Arizona yo mu majyaruguru iherereye mu mugi wa Flagstaff muri leta ya Arizona, yagize ati "nubwo ubushyuhe bw'ibyo binyabuzima budashobora guhinduka nk'ubw'imigezi nini yo ku isi, birumvikana ko ibyo binyabuzima by'ikirere ari imigezi ikomeye cyane".

src: In France, voting has traditionally been a low-tech experience: voters isolate themselves in a booth, put a pre-printed sheet of paper indicating their candidate of choice into an envelope.
tgt: Mu Bufaransa, gutora ni umuco w'ikoranabuhanga ridahagije: abatoza biherereye mu cyumba cyo gutora, bashyira urupapuro rwasohotse rwerekana umukandida bahisemo muri enveloppe.

src: After officials verify the voter's identity, the voter drops the envelope into the ballot box and signs the voting roll.
tgt: Nyuma y'uko abategetsi basuzumye niba uwo muntu ari we, uwo muntu ashyira iyo mvugo mu gasanduku k'amatora maze ashyira umukono ku rupapuro rw'amatora.

src: French electoral law rather strictly codifies the proceedings.
tgt: Amategeko y'u Bufaransa ajyanye n'amatora ateganya neza uko amatora azaba.

src: Since 1988, ballot boxes must be transparent so that voters and observers can witness that no envelopes are present at the start of the vote and that no envelopes are added except those of the duly counted and authorized voters.
tgt: Kuva mu mwaka wa 1988, amakarita y'amatora ategerezwa kuba asobanutse neza kugira ngo abatoza n'abagenzuzi bashobore guhamya ko nta ma envelopes ariho mu ntangiriro z'amatora kandi ko nta ma envelopes yongeye kuboneka keretse ay'abatoza babonetse neza kandi bemerewe.

src: Candidates can send representatives to witness every part of the process. In the evening, votes are counted by volunteers under heavy supervision, following specific procedures.
tgt: Ku mugoroba, amajwi aharurwa n'abikorera ku bushake, bagakurikiranwa cyane, hakurikijwe uburyo bwihariye bwo gukora.

src: ASUS Eee PC, earlier launched world-wide for cost-saving and functionality factors, became a hot topic in 2007 Taipei IT Month.
tgt: ASUS Eee PC, mbere yatangijwe ku isi hose kubera ibiciro n'imikorere, yabaye ikibazo cy'ingenzi mu 2007 Taipei IT Month

src: But the consumer market on laptop computer will be radically varied and changed after ASUS was awarded in the 2007 Taiwan Sustainable Award by Executive Yuan of the Republic of China.
tgt: Ariko isoko ry'ibikoresho by'ikoranabuhanga rizahinduka cyane nyuma y'uko ASUS yahawe igihembo cya 2007 cya Taiwan Sustainable Award na Executive Yuan ya Repubulika y'u Bushinwa.

src: The station's web site describes the show as "old school radio theater with a new and outrageous geeky spin!"
tgt: Urubuga rwa interineti rw'iyo televiziyo ruvuga ko iyo filime ari "indirimbo ya kera y'umuziki wo kuri radiyo, ifite imiterere mishya kandi y'ubupfumu!"

src: In its early days, the show was featured solely at the long-running internet radio site TogiNet Radio, a site focused on talk radio.
tgt: Mu minsi ya mbere, iki gitaramo cyagaragaye gusa ku rubuga rwa interineti rwa TogiNet Radio, urubuga rwibandaga cyane ku kiganiro cya radio.

src: In late 2015, TogiNet established AstroNet Radio as a subsidiary station.
tgt: Mu mpera z'umwaka wa 2015, TogiNet yatangije AstroNet Radio nk'ikigo cy'ishami.

src: The show originally featured amateur voice actors, local to East Texas.
tgt: Mu ntangiriro iyi filime yari igizwe n'abacuraranzi b'abacuraranzi bo muri Texas y'iburasirazuba .

src: Widespread looting reportedly continued overnight, as law enforcement officers were not present on Bishkek's streets.
tgt: Bitangazwa ko ubujura bwakomeje mu ijoro, kubera ko abasirikare batari bari mu mihanda ya Bishkek.

src: Bishkek was described as sinking into a state of "anarchy" by one observer, as gangs of people roamed the streets and plundered stores of consumer goods.
tgt: Umwe mu babonye ibintu yavuze ko i Bishkek hagiye habaho "imvururu" kubera ko amatsinda y'abantu yatemberaga mu mihanda kandi akambura ibicuruzwa byo mu maduka.

src: Several Bishkek residents blamed protesters from the south for the lawlessness.
tgt: Abaturage benshi bo mu mujyi wa Bishkek bashinja abitabiriye imyigaragambyo bo mu majyepfo ko ari bo bagize uruhare mu kurenga ku mategeko.

src: South Africa have defeated the All Blacks (New Zealand) in a rugby union Tri Nations match at the Royal Bafokeng Stadium in Rustenburg, South Africa.
tgt: Afurika y'Epfo yatsinze All Blacks (New Zealand) mu mukino wa Rugby union Tri Nations ku kibuga cya Royal Bafokeng i Rustenburg muri Afurika y'Epfo.

src: The final score was a one-point victory, 21 to 20, ending the All Blacks' 15 game winning streak.
tgt: Igitsindo cya nyuma cyabaye igitego kimwe cy'intsinzi, 21 kuri 20, bica umukino wa 15 All Blacks yatsinze.

src: For the Springboks, it ended a five-match losing streak.
tgt: Ku bakinnyi ba Springboks, byahise bituma batsindwa imikino itanu.

src: It was the final match for the All Blacks, who had already won the trophy two weeks ago.
tgt: Ni umukino wa nyuma wa All Blacks, yari yaratsinze igikombe mu byumweru bibiri bishize.

src: The final match of the series will take place at Ellis Park in Johannesburg next week, when the Springboks play Australia.
tgt: Imikino ya nyuma y'iyi mikino izakinwa kuri Ellis Park i Johannesburg mu cyumweru gitaha, ubwo Springboks izakina na Australia.

src: A moderate earthquake shook western Montana at 10:08 p.m. on Monday.
tgt: Ikinyamugigima cy'ubumara cyaguye mu burengerazuba bwa Montana saa kumi n'ebyiri n'igice z'umugoroba ku wa mbere.

src: No immediate reports of damage have been received by the United States Geological Survey (USGS) and its National Earthquake Information Center.
tgt: Ikigo cya Leta Zunze Ubumwe z'Amerika gishinzwe ubushakashatsi mu by'ubutaka (USGS) n'Ikigo cyacyo gishinzwe gutanga amakuru ku birebana n'imitingito, ntibyabonye raporo z'ibiza.

src: The earthquake was centered about 20 km (15 miles) north-northeast of Dillon, and about 65 km (40 miles) south of Butte.
tgt: Ikinyamugigima cyabereye ku birometero 20 mu majyaruguru y'amajyaruguru y'uburasirazuba bwa Dillon, no ku birometero 65 mu majyepfo ya Butte.

src: The strain of bird flu lethal to humans, H5N1, has been confirmed to have infected a dead wild duck, found on Monday, in marshland near Lyon in the east of France.
tgt: H5N1, ubwoko bw'ibicurane by'inyoni bica abantu, byemejwe ko byagize ingaruka ku ndogobe y'inyoni yari yarapfuye, yabonetse ku wa mbere, mu biyaga hafi ya Lyon mu burasirazuba bw'Ubufaransa.

src: France is the seventh country in the European Union to suffer this virus; following Austria, Germany, Slovenia, Bulgaria, Greece and Italy.
tgt: U Bufaransa ni igihugu cya karindwi muri Umuryango w'Ubumwe bw'u Burayi gihangayikishijwe n'iki cyorezo; nyuma ya Otirishiya, Ubudage, Slovenia, Bulugariya, u Bugiriki n'u Butaliyani.

src: Suspected cases of H5N1 in Croatia and Denmark remain unconfirmed.
tgt: Ibipimo by'abanduye H5N1 muri Croatie na Danemark biracyari bitaremejwe.

src: Chambers had sued God for "widespread death, destruction and terrorization of millions upon millions of the Earth's inhabitants."
tgt: Chambers yari yarashinje Imana ko "yatumye abantu babarirwa muri za miriyoni bo ku isi bapfa, barimburwa kandi bakagira ubwoba".

src: Chambers, an agnostic, argues that his lawsuit is "frivolous" and "anybody can sue anybody."
tgt: Chambers, umwe mu bantu batemera ko Imana ibaho, avuga ko ibyo aregwa "bitagira ishingiro" kandi ko "umuntu wese ashobora kuburanisha undi wese".

src: The story presented in the French opera, by Camille Saint-Saens, is of an artist "whose life is dictated by a love for drugs and Japan."
tgt: Iyo filimi y'Igifaransa ya Camille Saint-Saens ivuga inkuru y'umuhanzi "wakundaga ibiyobyabwenge n'Ubuyapani mu buzima bwe".

src: As a result, the performers smoke cannabis joints on stage, and the theatre itself is encouraging the audience to join in.
tgt: Ibyo byatumye abacuraranzi banywa ibiyobyabwenge byo mu bwoko bwa cannabidiol ku rubyiniro, kandi n'icyumba cy'imyidagaduro ubwabyo kigatera abantu inkunga yo kwifatanya na bo mu kunywa.

src: Former House Speaker Newt Gingrich, Texas governor Rick Perry, and Congresswoman Michele Bachmann finished in fourth, fifth, and sixth place, respectively.
tgt: Uwahoze ari Perezida w'Inama y'Abaminisitiri Newt Gingrich, Guverineri wa Texas Rick Perry, n'Umunyamabanga wa Sena Michele Bachmann, bahagaze ku mwanya wa kane, wa gatanu n'uwa gatandatu, buri wese ku mwanya we.

src: After the results came in, Gingrich lauded Santorum, but had tough words for Romney, on whose behalf negative campaign advertisements were aired in Iowa against Gingrich.
tgt: Nyuma y'uko ibyavuye mu matora bitangazwa, Gingrich yashimiye Santorum, ariko avuga amagambo mabi kuri Romney, uwatangajwe mu itangazamakuru mu ntara ya Iowa mu bikorwa byo kwiyamamaza bya Gingrich.

src: Perry stated that he would "return to Texas to assess the results of tonight's caucus, determine whether there is a path forward for myself in this race," but later said that he would remain in the race and compete in the January 21 South Carolina primary.
tgt: Perry yavuze ko "azagaruka muri Texas kugira ngo arebe ibyavuye mu matora y'uyu mugoroba, asobanukirwe niba hari inzira yo gutera imbere muri iri rushanwa", ariko nyuma yavuze ko azakomeza muri iri rushanwa no guhatana mu matora yo muri Karolina y'Amajyepfo ku itariki ya 21 Mutarama.

src: Bachmann, who won the Ames Straw Poll in August, decided to end her campaign.
tgt: Bachmann, watsinze amatora ya Ames Straw mu kwezi k'Ugushyingo, yafashe umwanzuro wo guhagarika urugamba rwe.

src: The photographer was transported to Ronald Reagan UCLA Medical Center, where he subsequently died.
tgt: Uwo muntu wafashe iyo foto yajyanywe mu Bitaro bya Ronald Reagan byo muri kaminuza ya UCLA, ari na ho yaje gupfa.

src: He was reportedly aged in his 20s. In a statement, Bieber said "[w]hile I was not present nor directly involved with this tragic accident, my thoughts and prayers are with the family of the victim."
tgt: Mu itangazo yashyize ahagaragara, Bieber yagize ati "nubwo ntaho nari ndi kandi nta na kimwe na kimwe nagize muri iyi mpanuka y'agahomamunwa, ibitekerezo byanjye n'amasengesho yanjye biri kumwe n'umuryango w'uwapfuye".

src: Entertainment news website TMZ understands the photographer stopped his vehicle on the other side of Sepulveda Boulevard and attempted to take pictures of the police stop before crossing the road and continuing, prompting the California Highway Patrol police officer conducting the traffic stop to order him back across, twice.
tgt: Urubuga rw'amakuru y'imyidagaduro TMZ ruvuga ko uwo mufotora yahagaritse imodoka ye ku rundi ruhande rwa Sepulveda Boulevard maze agerageza gufata amafoto y'aho polisi ihagaritse imodoka mbere yo kurenga umuhanda no gukomeza urugendo rwe, bituma umupolisi wa California Highway Patrol wari uhagaritse imodoka amutegeka kugaruka mu muhanda, kabiri.

src: According to police, the driver of the vehicle that hit the photographer is unlikely to face criminal charges.
tgt: Dukurikije uko polisi ibivuga, umushoferi w'imodoka yakubise uwo mufata ifoto, nta bwo ashobora guhanwa icyaha.

src: With only eighteen medals available a day, a number of countries have failed to make the medal podium.
tgt: Kubera ko buri munsi hatangwa imidali cumi n'umunani gusa, hari ibihugu byinshi byabuze imidali yo gushyigikira.

src: They include the Netherlands, with Anna Jochemsen finishing ninth in the women's standing class in the Super-G yesterday, and Finland with Katja Saarinen finishing tenth in the same event.
tgt: Muri bo harimo u Buholandi, aho Anna Jochemsen yashoje ku mwanya wa cyenda mu cyiciro cy'abagore bari bahagaze muri Super-G ejo, na Finlande aho Katja Saarinen yashoje ku mwanya wa cumi muri uwo mukino.

src: Australia's Mitchell Gourley finished eleventh in the men's standing Super-G. Czech competitor Oldrich Jelinek finished sixteenth in the men's sitting Super-G.
tgt: Mitchell Gourley wo muri Ositaraliya yegukanye umwanya wa 11 muri Super-G y'abagabo. Oldrich Jelinek wo muri Czech yegukanye umwanya wa 16 muri Super-G y'abagabo bari ku ntebe.

src: Arly Velasquez of Mexico finished fifteenth in the men's sitting Super-G. New Zealand's Adam Hall finished ninth in the men's standing Super-G.
tgt: Arly Velasquez wo muri Megizike yageze ku mwanya wa cumi n'itanu muri Super-G y'abagabo. Adam Hall wo muri Nouvelle-Zélande yageze ku mwanya wa cyenda muri Super-G y'abagabo bari bahagaze.

src: Poland's men's visually impaired skier Maciej Krezel and guide Anna Ogarzynska finished thirteenth in the Super-G. South Korea's Jong Seork Park finished twenty-fourth in the men's sitting Super-G.
tgt: Abakinnyi b'abagabo b'impumyi bo muri Polonye, Maciej Krezel n'umuyobozi Anna Ogarzynska bahize ku mwanya wa cumi n'itatu muri Super-G. Jong Seork Park wo muri Koreya y'Epfo yaje ku mwanya wa makumyabiri n'ine muri Super-G y'abagabo bari ku ntebe.

src: UN peacekeepers, whom arrived in Haiti after the 2010 earthquake, are being blamed for the spread of the disease which started near the troop's encampment.
tgt: Ingabo z'Umuryango w'Abibumbye zitanga amahoro zageze muri Haiti nyuma y'umutingito wo mu mwaka wa 2010, zarashinjwaga ko ari zo zakwirakwije iyo ndwara yatangiriye hafi y'ikambi z'ingabo.

src: According to the lawsuit, waste from the UN camp was not properly sanitized, causing bacteria to enter the tributary of the Artibonite River, one of Haiti's largest.
tgt: Dukurikije icyo cyemezo cy'urukiko, imyanda yo mu nkambi y'Umuryango w'Abibumbye ntiyigeze isukuzwa mu buryo bukwiriye, bigatuma utwo dukoko twinjiza mu ruzi rwa Artibonite, rumwe mu ruzi rukomeye cyane muri Hayiti.

src: Prior to the arrival of troops, Haiti had not encountered problems related to the disease since the 1800s.
tgt: Mbere y'uko ingabo ziza, kuva mu myaka ya 1800, Haïti ntiyari yarigeze ihura n'ibibazo byatewe n'iyo ndwara.

src: The Haitian Institute for Justice and Democracy has referenced independent studies that suggest the Nepalese UN peacekeeping battalion unknowingly brought the disease to Haiti.
tgt: Ikigo cya Haiti gishinzwe ubutabera n'ubwiyunge cyavuze ko ubushakashatsi bw'abantu ubwabo bwagaragaje ko ingabo z'Umuryango w'Abibumbye zo mu gihugu cya Nepale zitwara amahoro ari zo zazanye iyo ndwara muri Haiti zitari zizi.

src: Danielle Lantagne, a UN expert on the disease, stated the outbreak was likely caused by the peacekeepers.
tgt: Danielle Lantagne, umuhanga mu by'iki cyorezo w'Umuryango w'Abibumbye, yavuze ko iki cyorezo gishobora kuba cyatewe n'abasirikare barinda amahoro.

src: Hamilton confirmed Howard University Hospital admitted the patient in stable condition.
tgt: Hamilton yemeje ko ibitaro bya Howard University Hospital byemeye ko uwo murwayi ari mu buzima bwiza.

src: The patient had been to Nigeria, where some cases of the Ebola virus have occurred.
tgt: Uwo murwayi yari yaragiye muri Nijeriya, aho abarwayi bamwe na bamwe b'icyorezo cya Ebola babonetse.

src: The hospital has followed protocol for infection control, including separating the patient from others to prevent possible infection of others.
tgt: Icyo bitaro cyakurikije uburyo bwo kurwanya ubwandu, harimo no gutandukanya umurwayi n'abandi kugira ngo hatagira ubwandu bwanduza abandi.

src: Before The Simpsons Simon had worked on several shows in various positions.
tgt: Mbere y'uko The Simpsons itangira, Simon yakoraga mu bitaramo bitandukanye mu myanya itandukanye.

src: During the 1980s he worked on shows such as Taxi, Cheers, and The Tracy Ullman Show.
tgt: Mu myaka ya 1980 yakoraga mu bitaramo nka Taxi, Cheers, na The Tracy Ullman Show.

src: In 1989 he helped create The Simpsons with Brooks and Groening, and was responsible for hiring the show's first writing team.
tgt: Mu 1989 yafashije mu gukora The Simpsons na Brooks na Groening, kandi ni we wari ufite inshingano zo kwinjiza itsinda rya mbere ry'abanditsi b'iyi filime.

src: Despite leaving the show in 1993 he kept the title of executive producer, and continued to receive tens of millions of dollars every season in royalties.
tgt: Nubwo yavuye muri iyo filime mu mwaka wa 1993, yakomeje kuba umuyobozi w'abategura iyo filime, kandi yakomezaga guhabwa amadolari agera kuri miriyoni mirongo buri mwaka.

src: Earlier the Chinese news agency Xinhua reported a plane to be hijacked.
tgt: Mbere yaho ikigo cy'itangazamakuru cy'Ubushinwa Xinhua cyatangaje ko hari indege yafashwe.

src: Later reports then stated the plane received a bomb threat and was diverted back to Afghanistan, landing in Kandahar.
tgt: Raporo za nyuma zatangaje ko indege yahawe igitero cy'ibisasu kandi ko yagarutse muri Afuganisitani, ikagwa i Kandahar.

src: The early reports say the plane was diverted back to Afghanistan after being denied an emergency landing in Ürümqi.
tgt: Raporo za mbere zivuga ko indege yagarutse muri Afuganistani nyuma yo kwanga kuguruka mu buryo bw'agateganyo i Ürümqi.

src: Air accidents are common in Iran, which has an aging fleet that is poorly maintained both for civil and military operations.
tgt: Ibiza by'indege ni ibisanzwe muri Irani, kuko ifite indege z'intambara zidakora neza mu bikorwa by'abaturage n'iby'igisirikare.

src: International sanctions have meant that new aircraft cannot be purchased.
tgt: Ibihano mpuzamahanga byatumye indege nshya zitabasha kugurwa.

src: Earlier this week, a police helicopter crash killed three people and wounded three more.
tgt: Mu ntangiriro z'iki cyumweru, impanuka y'indege y'abapolisi yishe abantu batatu, abandi batatu barakomereka.

src: Last month Iran saw its worst air disaster in years when an airliner heading to Armenia crashed, killing the 168 on board.
tgt: Mu kwezi gushize, Irani yahuye n'impanuka y'indege ikomeye kurusha izindi mu myaka ishize ubwo indege yari igeze muri Arumeniya yagongaga, abantu 168 bari bayirimo barapfa.

src: The same month saw another airliner overrun a runway at Mashhad and strike a wall, killing seventeen.
tgt: Muri uwo mwaka, hari indi ndege yaguye mu kibuga cy'indege cya Mashhad, igakubita uruzitiro, maze abantu 17 barapfa.

src: Aerosmith have cancelled their remaining concerts on their tour.
tgt: Aerosmith yahagaritse ibitaramo byari bisigaye mu rugendo rwabo.

src: The rock band was due to tour the United States and Canada until September 16.
tgt: Iri tsinda ry'abahanzi b'indirimbo zo mu njyana ya rock ryari rifite gahunda yo kuzenguruka Leta Zunze Ubumwe z'Amerika na Kanada kugeza ku itariki ya 16 Nzeri.

src: They have cancelled the tour after lead singer Steven Tyler was injured after he fell off stage while performing on August 5.
tgt: Bahagaritse igitaramo cyabo nyuma y'aho umuririmbyi Steven Tyler yakomeretse nyuma yo kugwa avuye ku rubyiniro mu gitaramo cyo ku itariki ya 5 Kanama.

src: Murray lost the first set in a tie break after both men held each and every serve in the set.
tgt: Murray yatsinzwe set ya mbere nyuma y'uko aba bagabo bombi bafashe buri mukino muri set.

src: Del Potro had the early advantage in the second set, but this too required a tie break after reaching 6-6.
tgt: Del Potro yari afite amahirwe menshi mu gice cya kabiri, ariko na byo byasabye ko batsindwa nyuma yo kugera kuri 6-6.

src: Potro received treatment to his shoulder at this point but managed to return to the game.
tgt: Potro yahawe ubuvuzi ku rutugu rwe muri icyo gihe ariko yashoboye kugaruka mu mukino .

src: The program started at 8:30 p.m. local time (15.00 UTC).
tgt: Porogaramu yatangiye saa munani n'igice z'umugoroba (15.00 UTC) mu gihe cy'igihugu.

src: Famous singers across the country presented bhajans, or devotional songs, to Shri Shyam's feet.
tgt: Abahanzi bazwi hirya no hino mu gihugu baririmbiraga ibirenge bya Shri Shyam bhajans, cyangwa indirimbo zo gusenga.

src: Singer Sanju Sharma started the evening, followed by Jai Shankar Choudhary. esented the chhappan bhog bhajan as well. Singer, Raju Khandelwal was accompanying him.
tgt: Umuhanzikazi Sanju Sharma yatangije iki gitaramo, yakurikirwa na Jai Shankar Choudhary. yakoranye indirimbo ya chhappan bhog bhajan. Umuhanzikazi Raju Khandelwal yari kumwe na we.

src: Then, Lakkha Singh took the lead in singing the bhajans.
tgt: Hanyuma, Lakkha Singh yaje kuyobora mu kuririmbira bhajans.

src: 108 plates of Chhappan Bhog (in Hinduism, 56 different edible items, like, sweets, fruits, nuts, dishes etc. which are offered to deity) were served to Baba Shyam.
tgt: Baba Shyam yahawe amasahani 108 ya Chhappan Bhog (mu Buhindu, ibintu 56 bitandukanye by'ibiribwa, nk'ibishyimbo, imbuto, amagi, ibiryo n'ibindi bitangwa ku mana).

src: Lakkha Singh presented the chhappan bhog bhajan as well. Singer, Raju Khandelwal was accompanying him.
tgt: Lakkha Singh na we yaririmbye chhappan bhog bhajan. Umuhanzi, Raju Khandelwal yari kumwe na we .

src: At Thursday's keynote presentation of the Tokyo Game Show, Nintendo president Satoru Iwata unveiled the controller design for the company's new Nintendo Revolution console.
tgt: Ku wa kane ubwo hatangizwaga igitaramo cya Tokyo Game Show, Perezida wa Nintendo Satoru Iwata yashyize ahagaragara imiterere y'ibikoresho by'ikoranabuhanga by'iyi kompanyi ya Nintendo Revolution.

src: Resembling a television remote, the controller uses two sensors placed near the user's television to triangulate its position in three-dimensional space.
tgt: Kimwe n'ibikoresho byo kugenzura televiziyo, icyo gikoresho gikoresha ibintu bibiri bifata amashusho biri hafi ya televiziyo y'umuntu kugira ngo kimenye aho iri mu isanzure ry'ibintu bitatu.

src: This will allow players to control actions and movements in video games by moving the device through the air.
tgt: Ibi bizatuma abakinnyi bashobora kugenzura ibikorwa n'imikorere mu mikino ya videwo binyuze mu gukwirakwiza igikoresho mu kirere.

src: Giancarlo Fisichella lost control of his car and ended the race very soon after the start.
tgt: Giancarlo Fisichella yatakaje imodoka ye maze arangiza isiganwa nyuma gato y'uko itangiye.

src: His teammate Fernando Alonso was in the lead for most of the race, but ended it right after his pit-stop, probably because a badly tucked right front wheel.
tgt: Mu gihe cy'igice kinini cy'irushanwa, mugenzi we Fernando Alonso ni we wari ku mwanya wa mbere, ariko yarirangije nyuma gato y'aho yahagaze, wenda bitewe n'uko igare ry'imbere ry'iburyo ryari ridakomeye.

src: Michael Schumacher ended his race not long after Alonso, because of the suspension damage in the numerous battles during the race.
tgt: Michael Schumacher yarangije irushanwa rye nyuma gato y'uko Alonso arangije, bitewe n'ingaruka z'imvune yahuye na zo mu ntambara nyinshi mu gihe cy'irushanwa.

src: "She's very cute and sings quite well, too," he said according to a transcript of the news conference.
tgt: Dukurikije inyandiko y'inama y'abanyamakuru, yagize ati "ari mwiza cyane kandi aririmba neza. "

src: "I was moved every time we did a rehearsal on this, from the bottom of my heart."
tgt: Buri gihe iyo twakinaga iyo filime, byanteye inkunga cyane".

src: Around 3 minutes into the launch, an on-board camera showed numerous pieces of insulation foam break away from the fuel tank.
tgt: Nyuma y'iminota igera kuri 3 iyo ndege itangiye gukora, kamera yo muri iyo ndege yagaragaje ko ibice byinshi by'umufunzo byaturutse mu gisanduku cy'ibikomoka ku mazi.

src: However, they are not thought to have caused any damage to the shuttle.
tgt: Ariko kandi, nta gitekerezo kigaragaza ko ari byo byagize ingaruka ku bwato.

src: NASA's shuttle program chief N. Wayne Hale Jr. said the foam had fallen "after the time we are concerned about."
tgt: N. Wayne Hale Jr., umuyobozi w'ikigo cya NASA kigenzura gahunda yo kohereza indege mu kirere, yavuze ko uwo muco waguye "nyuma y'igihe twari twiteze ko kigera".

src: Five minutes into the display a wind starts rolling in, about a minute later, the wind is reaching 70km/h... then the rain comes, but so hard and so large that it slaps your skin like a needle, then hail fell from the sky, people panicking and screaming and running over each other.
tgt: Nyuma y'iminota itanu, umuyaga watangiye kwinjira, nyuma y'iminota mike, umuyaga ugera ku birometero 70 ku isaha... hanyuma imvura ikaza, ariko ikaba ikomeye cyane ku buryo ikakubita uruhu nk'urushinge, hanyuma imvura y'igisazi ikava mu kirere, abantu baterwa ubwoba, barira kandi barirukana.

src: I lost my sister and her friend, and on my way there were two disabled people in wheelchairs, people just jumping over and pushing them," Armand Versace said.
tgt: Nabuze mushiki wanjye n'umukunzi we, kandi mu nzira nari njya hari abantu babiri bafite ubumuga bari mu magare y'abagororwa, abantu barirukaga bakabasunikira", niko Armand Versace yavuze.

src: NHK also reported that the Kashiwazaki Kariwa nuclear power plant in Niigata prefecture was operating normally.
tgt: Ikinyamakuru NHK cyatangaje kandi ko umuriro w'amashanyarazi wa Kashiwazaki Kariwa wo mu ntara ya Niigata warimo gukora neza.

src: Hokuriku Electric Power Co. reported no effects from the earthquake and that the Number 1 and 2 reactors at its Shika nuclear power plant were shut down.
tgt: Ikigo cya Hokuriku Electric Power Co cyatangaje ko nta ngaruka z'umutingito wagize, kandi ko ibigega by'amashanyarazi 1 na 2 byo mu kigo cyacyo cya Shika byafunze.

src: It is reported that some 9400 homes in the region are without water and approximately 100 without electricity.
tgt: Bivugwa ko muri ako karere hari amazu agera kuri 9400 adafite amazi kandi ko hafi 100 adafite umuriro w'amashanyarazi.

src: Some roads have been damaged, railway service interrupted in the affected areas, and the Noto Airport in Ishikawa prefecture remains closed.
tgt: Inzira zimwe na zimwe zarangiritse, ingendo z'imodoka za gari ya moshi zarangiritse mu turere twugarijwe n'iki cyorezo, kandi ikibuga cy'indege cya Noto mu ntara ya Ishikawa kiracyari kifunze.

src: One bomb exploded outside the governor general's office.
tgt: Bimwe muri byo byaturikiye hanze y'ibiro bya guverineri mukuru.

src: Three more bombs exploded near government buildings in a period of two hours.
tgt: Mu gihe cy'amasaha abiri, ibindi bitero bitatu bya bombe byaturikiye hafi y'inyubako za leta.

src: Some reports put the official death toll at eight, and official reports confirm that up to 30 were injured; but final numbers are not yet known.
tgt: Raporo zimwe na zimwe zivuga ko abantu umunani ari bo bapfuye, kandi raporo z'abategetsi zigaragaza ko abantu bagera kuri 30 bakomeretse; ariko imibare y'iherezo ntikiri kumenyekana.

src: Both cyanuric acid and melamine were found in urine samples from pets that died after consuming contaminated pet food.
tgt: Asidi ya cyanuric na melamine byabonetse mu misemburo y'ibitunguru byapfuye nyuma yo kurya ibiryo by'ibitunguru byanduye.

src: The two compounds react with one another to form crystals that may block kidney function, researchers at the university said.
tgt: Abashakashatsi bo muri iyo kaminuza bavuze ko iyo mirimo ibiri ikora mu buryo butandukanye, bigatuma habaho ibishushanyo bishobora guhagarika imikorere y'imisemburo.

src: The researchers observed crystals formed in cat urine by the addition of melamine and cyanuric acid.
tgt: Abashakashatsi babonye ko mu maraso y'inkoko habamo ibintu byitwa amaterasi (cyanuric acid) na melamine.

src: The composition of these crystals matches those found in the urine of affected pets when compared by infrared spectroscopy (FTIR).
tgt: Ibikubiye muri ibyo binyabuzima bihuje n'ibikubiye mu maraso y'inyamaswa zifite iyo ndwara, iyo bigereranywa n'ibikubiye mu maraso y'inyamaswa zifite iyo ndwara binyuze mu ikoranabuhanga ryitwa infrared spectroscopy.

src: I don't know if you realize it or not, but most of the goods from Central America came into this country duty-free.
tgt: Sinzi niba ubizi cyangwa utabizi, ariko ibicuruzwa byinshi biva muri Amerika yo Hagati byinjizwaga muri iki gihugu nta misoro.

src: Yet eighty percent of our goods were taxed through tariffs in Central American countries. we treat you.
tgt: Nyamara 80 ku ijana by'ibintu byacu byafatiwe imisoro mu bihugu byo muri Amerika yo Hagati. turagukorera.

src: That didn't seem to make sense to me; it certainly wasn't fair.
tgt: Ibyo ntibyari bihuje n'ubwenge kuri jye, kandi nta gushidikanya ko byari akarengane.

src: All I say to people is you treat us the way we treat you.
tgt: Icyo mvuga ku bantu ni uko mutugirira nk'uko natwe tubakorera.

src: California Governor Arnold Schwarzenegger signed into law a bill that bans the sale or rental of violent video games to minors.
tgt: Guverineri w'intara ya California, Arnold Schwarzenegger, yashyize umukono ku itegeko ribuza abana bato kugurishwa cyangwa kugurishwa imikino ya videwo irimo urugomo.

src: The bill requires violent video games sold in the state of California to be labeled with a decal reading "18" and makes their sale to a minor punishable by a fine of $1000 per offense.
tgt: Iryo tegeko rivuga ko imikino ya videwo irangwa n'urugomo igurishwa muri leta ya Kaliforniya igomba kuba ifite ikimenyetso kigira kiti "18" kandi ko iyo igurishijwe ku muntu uri mu kigero cy'imyaka 18 cyangwa munsi y'iyo igihano gishobora kuba amafaranga 1000 y'amadolari ku cyaha cyose.

src: The Director of Public Prosecutions, Kier Starmer QC, gave a statement this morning announcing the prosecution of both Huhne and Pryce.
tgt: Umuyobozi w'Ubugenzacyaha, Kier Starmer QC, yashyize ahagaragara itangazo uyu munsi mu gitondo avuga ko Huhne na Pryce bashyikirijwe ubutabera.

src: Huhne has resigned and he will be replaced in the Cabinet by Ed Davey MP. Norman Lamb MP is expected to take the Business Minister job Davey is vacating.
tgt: Huhne yatanze imihoho kandi azasimbuzwa mu Nteko Ishinga Amategeko na Ed Davey MP. Norman Lamb MP byitezwe ko azaba Minisitiri w'Ubucuruzi Davey agiye kureka.

src: Huhne and Pryce are scheduled to appear at the Westminster Magistrates Court on February 16.
tgt: Huhne na Pryce biteganyijwe ko bazahaguruka mu rukiko rwa Westminster Magistrates Court ku itariki ya 16 Gashyantare.

src: The fatalities were Nicholas Alden, 25, and Zachary Cuddeback, 21. Cuddeback had been the driver.
tgt: Abo bapfuye bari Nicholas Alden w'imyaka 25 na Zachary Cuddeback w'imyaka 21. Cuddeback yari umushoferi.

src: Edgar Veguilla received arm and jaw wounds while Kristoffer Schneider was left requiring reconstructive surgery for his face.
tgt: Edgar Veguilla yakomerekejwe n'inkoni z'ikiganza n'iz'iburyo, mu gihe Kristoffer Schneider yari akeneye kubagwa mu maso kugira ngo asubiremo.

src: Uka's weapon failed whilst pointed at a fifth man's head. Schneider has ongoing pain, blindness in one eye, a missing section of skull and a face rebuilt from titanium.
tgt: Igikoresho cya Uka cyaguye mu gihe cyerekeje ku mutwe w'umuntu wa gatanu. Schneider aracyafite ububabare, ubuhumyi mu ijisho rimwe, igice cy'umutwe kirimo gutakara ndetse n'urusobe rwubatswe n'icyitwa titanium.
