tgt: Jya wirinda ko umwenda utera ubushyuhe bukabije (kuko bishobora gutuma ukongoka, cyangwa mu bihe bikomeye, ukawushya).

src: There are different ways of purifying water, some more effective against specific threats.
tgt: Hari uburyo butandukanye bwo gucukura amazi, bumwe muri bwo bukora neza cyane mu kurwanya ibintu bimwe na bimwe byangiza.

src: In some areas boiling water for a minute is enough, in others several minutes are needed.
tgt: Mu turere tumwe na tumwe, kunywa amazi mu minota imwe ni byo bihagije, mu bindi hakaba hakenewe iminota myinshi.

src: Filters vary in effectiveness, and should you have a concern, then you should consider buying your water in a sealed bottle from a reputable company.
tgt: Hari uburyo butandukanye bwo gucukura amazi, kandi niba hari icyo uhangayikishijwe n'ibyo, wagombye gutekereza kugura amazi mu macupa afashwe n'ikigo cy'ubucuruzi gifite ishema.

src: Travellers may encounter animal pests that they are not familiar with in their home regions.
tgt: Abakora ingendo bashobora guhura n'inyamaswa z'ibicurane batazi mu turere twabo.

src: Pests can spoil food, cause irritation, or in a worse case cause allergic reactions, spread venom, or transmit infections.
tgt: Inzige zishobora kwangiza ibyokurya, zituma umuntu arwara, cyangwa mu bihe bibi kurushaho, zishobora gutuma umuntu arwara, zigatanga uburozi, cyangwa zikazana ubwandu.

src: Infectious diseases themselves, or dangerous animals that can injure or kill people by force, do not usually qualify as pests.
tgt: Ubusanzwe, indwara ziterwa n'ubwandu, cyangwa inyamaswa z'akaga zishobora gukomeretsa cyangwa kwica abantu ku ngufu, ntizifatwa nk'ibiyobyabwenge.

src: Duty free shopping is the opportunity to buy goods exempted from taxes and excises at certain locations.
tgt: Gushyiraho imisoro ku bicuruzwa ni uburyo bwo kugura ibicuruzwa bitishyurwa imisoro n'imisoro ku bicuruzwa mu duce tumwe na tumwe.

src: Travellers bound for countries with heavy taxation can sometimes save a considerable amount of money, especially on products such as alcoholic beverages and tobacco.
tgt: Abantu bajya mu bihugu byinjiza imisoro myinshi, rimwe na rimwe bashobora kurinda amafaranga menshi cyane, cyane cyane ku bintu nk'inzoga n'itabi.

src: The stretch between Point Marion and Fairmont presents the most challenging driving conditions on the Buffalo-Pittsburgh Highway, passing frequently through isolated backwoods terrain.
tgt: Umuhanda uva i Point Marion ugana i Fairmont, ni wo muhanda ukomeye cyane uhuza Buffalo na Pittsburgh, kuko akenshi ugenda mu mashyamba.

src: If you're not used to driving on country roads, keep your wits about you: steep grades, narrow lanes, and sharp curves predominate.
tgt: Niba utaramenyereye gutwara imodoka mu mihanda yo mu gihugu, jya witegereza aho uri, kuko hari imihanda myinshi ifite imihanda miremire, imisozi minini, n'imisozi y'amabuye.

src: Posted speed limits are noticeably lower than in previous and subsequent sections - commonly 35-40 mph (56-64 km/h) - and strict obedience to them is even more important than otherwise.
tgt: Ibipimo by'urugendo byashyizweho biri hasi cyane ugereranyije n'ibivugwa mu bice bya mbere n'ibikurikiraho - akenshi ni 35-40 mph (56-64 km/h) - kandi kubikurikiza byuzuye ni iby'ingenzi kurusha ibindi.

src: Curiously, though, mobile phone service is much stronger here than along many other stretches of the route, e.g. the Pennsylvania Wilds.
tgt: Ariko kandi, ikibabaje ni uko muri ako gace hakoreshwa telefoni ngendanwa cyane kurusha mu tundi turere tw'uwo muhanda, urugero nk'uwa Pennsylvania Wilds.

src: German pastries are quite good, and in Bavaria, are quite rich and varied, similar to those of their southern neighbor, Austria.
tgt: Ibishyimbo by'Abadage ni byiza cyane, kandi muri Bavière, ni byinshi kandi bitandukanye, nk'ibya mugenzi wabo wo mu majyepfo, ari we Otirishe.

src: Fruit pastries are common, with apples cooked into pastries year round, and cherries and plums making their appearances during the summer.
tgt: Ibishyimbo by'imbuto ni ibisanzwe, kandi mu gihe cy'impeshyi, mu gihe cy'umwaka wose, abantu barya amapera, kandi mu gihe cy'impeshyi, abantu barya amaseri n'ibishyimbo.

src: Many German baked goods also feature almonds, hazelnuts, and other tree nuts. Popular cakes often pair particularly well with a cup of strong coffee.
tgt: Hari n'ibishyimbo byinshi by'Abadage bifashisha amande, amagi, n'ibindi binyobwa.

src: If you want some small though rich pastries, try what depending on region are called Berliner, Pfannkuchen or Krapfen.
tgt: Niba wifuza ibishyimbo byoroheje ariko byimbitse, gerageza ibishyimbo byitwa Berliner, Pfannkuchen cyangwa Krapfen, bitewe n'aho ubika.

src: A curry is a dish based on herbs and spices, together with either meat or vegetables.
tgt: Kari ni ifunguro rigizwe n'ibishyimbo n'ibikomokaho, hamwe n'inyama cyangwa ibishyimbo.

src: A curry can be either "dry" or "wet" depending on the amount of liquid.
tgt: Ikiriyo gishobora kuba "kizima" cyangwa "kizima" hakurikijwe umubare w'amazi.

src: In inland regions of Northern India and Pakistan, yogurt is commonly used in curries; in Southern India and some other coastal regions of the subcontinent, coconut milk is commonly used.
tgt: Mu turere two mu majyaruguru y'u Buhinde no muri Pakisitani, yogurt ikoreshwa cyane mu biryo; mu majyepfo y'u Buhinde no mu tundi turere two ku nkengero z'inyanja, amata ya kokoto akoreshwa cyane.

src: With 17,000 islands to choose from, Indonesian food is an umbrella term covering a vast variety of regional cuisines found across the nation.
tgt: Kubera ko muri Indoneziya hari ibirwa bigera ku 17.000, ibiribwa byo muri icyo gihugu ni ubwoko bwinshi bw'ibiribwa byo mu turere tw'icyo gihugu twose.

src: But, if used without further qualifiers, the term tends to mean the food originally from the central and eastern parts of the main island Java.
tgt: Ariko kandi, iyo iryo jambo ryakoreshejwe mu buryo bw'ikigereranyo, usanga ryerekeza ku biribwa byaturukaga mu turere two mu majyaruguru no mu burasirazuba bw'igice kinini cy'izinga rya Java.

src: Now widely available throughout the archipelago, Javanese cuisine features an array of simply seasoned dishes, the predominant flavorings the Javanese favor being peanuts, chillies, sugar (especially Javanese coconut sugar) and various aromatic spices.
tgt: Muri iki gihe, mu biribwa by'Abanya-Jawa, harimo ibiryo byinshi byatungwa n'ibishyimbo, ariko ibiryo by'ibishyimbo Abanyarwanda bakunda cyane ni amagi, icyayi, isukari (cyane cyane isukari y'umwimerere) n'ibishyimbo by'ubwoko butandukanye.

src: Stirrups are supports for the rider's feet that hang down on either side of the saddle.
tgt: Ibishushanyo by'ibirenge by'uwo ugenderaho, biganisha ku mpande zombi z'iyo ntebe.

src: They provide greater stability for the rider but can have safety concerns due to the potential for a rider's feet to get stuck in them.
tgt: Izo mbunda zituma umushoferi azigama neza, ariko zishobora kugira ingaruka ku mutekano we bitewe n'uko ibirenge by'umushoferi byashoboraga kubangirika muri zo.

src: If a rider is thrown from a horse but has a foot caught in the stirrup, they could be dragged if the horse runs away. To minimize this risk, a number of safety precautions can be taken.
tgt: Iyo umushoferi w'ifarashi yavuye ku ifarashi, akagera ikirenge ku nkingi y'ifarashi, iyo ifarashi ikimuhunga, aba ashobora gukurwaho n'ifarashi.

src: First, most riders wear riding boots with a heel and a smooth, quite narrow, sole.
tgt: Icya mbere, abenshi mu bagendera ku magare bambara inkweto z'amagare zifite inkweto z'icyitegererezo kandi zifite inkweto z'inyuma zimeze neza kandi zinyuranye.

src: Next, some saddles, particularly English saddles, have safety bars that allow a stirrup leather to fall off the saddle if pulled backwards by a falling rider.
tgt: Ikindi kandi, ibishyimbo bimwe na bimwe, cyane cyane ibishyimbo by'Abangilikani, bifite udukingirizo twirinda ko igishyimbo kigwa mu ishyimbo mu gihe uwarigushye yagikubise inyuma.

src: Cochamó Valley - Chile's premier climbing destination, known as the Yosemite of South America, with a variety of granite big walls and crags.
tgt: Ikibaya cya Cochamó - ni cyo gice cya mbere muri Chili cyitwa Yosemite yo muri Amerika y'Epfo, kigizwe n'inkike nyinshi n'inkike z'amabuye y'agaciro.

src: Summits include breath-taking views from peaks. Climbers from all parts of the world are continually establishing new routes amongst its endless potential of walls.
tgt: Abantu baturutse mu bice byose by'isi bakomeza gushakisha uburyo bushya bwo kunyura mu misozi y'imisozi itarimo imipaka.

src: Downhill snowsports, which include skiing and snowboarding, are popular sports involving sliding down snow-covered terrain with skis or a snowboard attached to your feet.
tgt: Imikino yo gusinzira ku misozi y'icyayi, irimo n'iyitwa skiing n'iyitwa snowboarding, ni imikino ikundwa cyane, irimo no gusinzira ku misozi y'icyayi ukoresheje imisozi y'icyayi cyangwa snowboard igashyizwe ku birenge byawe.

src: Skiing is a major travelling activity with many enthusiasts, occasionally known as "ski bums," planning entire vacations around skiing at a particular location.
tgt: Gukina iski ni kimwe mu bikorwa by'ingenzi bihuza abantu benshi, rimwe na rimwe bitwa "abasigaye bakina iski", bateganya kujya mu kiruhuko cyose bakina iski ahantu runaka.

src: The idea of skiing is very old - cave paintings depicting skiers date back as far as 5000 BC!
tgt: Imyumvire yo gukina umupira w'amaguru ni iya kera cyane, kuko hari amashusho agaragaza abantu bakina umupira w'amaguru yagaragaye mu mpome kuva mu mwaka wa 5000 Mbere ya Yesu!

src: Downhill skiing as a sport goes back to at least the 17th century, and in 1861 the first recreational ski club was opened by Norwegians in Australia.
tgt: Imikino yo gusinzira ku misozi yatangiye nibura mu kinyejana cya 17, kandi mu mwaka wa 1861, ab'i Norvège ni bo batangije ikipe ya mbere yo gusinzira ku misozi muri Ositaraliya.

src: Backpacking by ski: This activity is also called backcountry ski, ski touring or ski hiking.
tgt: Gushyira ibicuruzwa mu migongo mu mukino wo gusiganwa ku magare: Uwo mukino nanone witwa gusiganwa ku magare mu misozi, gusiganwa ku magare cyangwa gutembera.

src: It is related to but usually not involving alpine style ski touring or mountaineering, the latter ones done in steep terrain and requiring much stiffer skis and boots.
tgt: Birasa na byo, ariko akenshi ntibikora mu buryo bw'imikino yo mu misozi yitwa alpine skiing cyangwa mountaineering, kuko iyo mikino ikorwa mu misozi y'amabuye kandi ikaba ikeneye imikino yo mu misozi yitwa alpine skiing n'inkweto zikomeye cyane.

src: Think of the skiing route as of a similar hiking route.
tgt: Tekereza kuri iyo nzira yo gukina umupira w'amaguru nk'aho ari inzira nk'iyo yo kugenda.

src: In good conditions you will be able to cover somewhat greater distances than walking - but only very seldom you will get the speeds of cross country skiing without a heavy backpack in groomed tracks.
tgt: Mu gihe ibintu bimeze neza, ushobora gukora urugendo rurerure cyane kurusha uko wakora ugendeye ku maguru, ariko ni gake cyane ushobora gukora urugendo rurerure nk'urw'umuntu wiyoroshya imisozi ku muhanda, utitwaye umutwaro uremereye ku mugongo.

src: Europe is a continent that is relatively small but with many independent countries. Under normal circumstances, travelling through multiple countries would mean having to go through visa applications and passport control multiple times.
tgt: U Burayi ni umugabane muto cyane ariko ufite ibihugu byinshi byigenga. Mu mimerere isanzwe, kugendera mu bihugu byinshi byumvikanisha gusaba viza no gusuzuma pasiporo inshuro nyinshi.

src: The Schengen zone, however, works somewhat like one country in this respect.
tgt: Icyakora, mu birebana n'ibyo, igice cya Schengen gikora nk'igihugu kimwe.

src: As long as you stay in this zone, you can generally cross borders without going through passport control checkpoints again.
tgt: Mu gihe cyose uba uri muri ako karere, akenshi ushobora kwambuka imipaka utazongera kujya mu bigo byigenzura impapuro z'inzira.

src: Similarly, by having a Schengen visa, you do not need to apply for visas to each of the Schengen member countries separately, hence saving time, money and paperwork.
tgt: Mu buryo nk'ubwo, iyo ufite viza ya Schengen, ntugomba gusaba viza mu bihugu byose bigize Schengen byonyine, bityo ukaba wirinda igihe, amafaranga n'amabaruwa.

src: There is no universal definition for which manufactured items are antiques. Some tax agencies define goods older than 100 years as antiques.
tgt: Ibiro bimwe na bimwe by'imisoro bivuga ko ibintu bifite imyaka irenga 100 ari ibintu by'igihe cyashize.

src: The definition has geographic variations, where the age limit might be shorter in places such as North America than in Europe.
tgt: Iyo mvugo itandukanye bitewe n'aho umuntu atuye, aho imyaka y'ubukure ishobora kuba mike mu duce nka Amerika y'Amajyaruguru kurusha mu Burayi.

src: Handicraft products might be defined as antiques, though they are younger than similar mass-produced goods.
tgt: Ibikoresho byakozwe n'amaboko bishobora gufatwa nk'ibya kera, n'ubwo biba bikiri bishya ugereranyije n'ibikoresho nk'ibyo bikorerwa ku bwinshi.

src: Reindeer husbandry is an important livelihood among the Sámi and the culture surrounding the trade is important also for many with other professions.
tgt: Ubuhinzi bw'ibitunguru ni umwuga w'ingenzi w'Abasami, kandi umuco w'ubucuruzi ni ingenzi no ku bantu benshi bakora indi mirimo.

src: Even traditionally, though, not all Sámi have been involved in big scale reindeer husbandry, but lived from fishing, hunting and similar, having reindeer mostly as draft animals.
tgt: Ariko kandi, no mu mico yabo ya kera, si Abasaami bose baragiraga ibitunguru byinshi, ahubwo babikoreshaga mu kuroba, mu kuroba no mu bindi bikorwa nk'ibyo, kandi akenshi babikoreshaga nk'inyamaswa zo gutwara abantu.

src: Today many Sámi work in modern trades. Tourism is an important income in Sápmi, the Sámi area.
tgt: Muri iki gihe, Abasaami benshi bakora imirimo y'ubucuruzi yo mu bihe bya none.

src: Though it is widely used, especially among non-Romani, the word "Gypsy" is often considered offensive because of its associations with negative stereotypes and inaccurate perceptions of Romani people.
tgt: Nubwo ikoreshwa cyane, cyane cyane n'abatari Abaromani, ijambo "Gypsy" akenshi rifatwa nk'iriteye isoni bitewe n'uko rifitaniye isano n'ibitekerezo bibi n'ibitekerezo bidakwiriye ku baturage b'Abaromani.

src: If the country you will be visiting becomes subject to a travel advisory, your travel health insurance or your trip cancellation insurance may be affected.
tgt: Niba igihugu ugiye gusura kigira inama ku bijyanye no gukora ingendo, inshuwaransi yawe y'ubuzima yo mu rugendo cyangwa inshuwaransi yo guhagarikwa kw'urugendo rwawe ishobora kugira ingaruka.

src: You may also wish to consult the advice of governments other than your own, but their advice is designed for their citizens.
tgt: Ushobora kandi gushakira inama izindi ntwaro, ariko izo nama zigenewe abaturage bazo.

src: As one example, American citizens in the Middle East might face different situations from Europeans or Arabs.
tgt: Urugero, abaturage b'Abanyamerika bo mu Burasirazuba bwo Hagati bashobora guhura n'imimerere itandukanye n'iy'Abanyaburayi cyangwa Abaarabu.

src: Advisories are merely a brief summary of the political situation in one country.
tgt: Ibitabo by'ubujyanama ni agace gato gusa k'imimerere ya politiki mu gihugu runaka.

src: The views presented are often cursory, general and oversimplified compared to the more detailed information available elsewhere.
tgt: Amagambo atangazwa akenshi aba ari ay'impimbano, y'imimerere rusange kandi asobanutse cyane ugereranyije n'amakuru asobanutse neza aboneka ahandi.

src: Severe weather is the generic term for any dangerous weather phenomenon with the potential to cause damage, serious social disruption, or loss of human life.
tgt: Imbeho mbi ni ijambo rivuga ikintu icyo ari cyo cyose cy'impanuka z'ikirere gishobora guteza impanuka, imivurungano ikomeye mu mibereho y'abantu cyangwa urupfu.

src: Severe weather can occur anywhere in the world, and there are different types of it, which can depend on geography, topography, and atmospheric conditions.
tgt: Imbeho idasanzwe ishobora kubaho ahantu hose ku isi, kandi ishobora kuba mu buryo butandukanye bitewe n'aho umuntu atuye, imiterere y'isi n'uko ikirere kimeze.

src: High winds, hail, excessive precipitation, and wildfires are forms and effects of severe weather, as are thunderstorms, tornadoes, waterspouts, and cyclones.
tgt: Umuyaga mwinshi, icyatsi, imvura nyinshi, n'umuriro w'amashyamba, ni bimwe mu bintu by'ikirere kibi, kimwe n'ibihuha, ibihuha, ibihuha by'amazi n'ibiyaga.

src: Regional and seasonal severe weather phenomena include blizzards, snowstorms, ice storms, and dust storms.
tgt: Mu bihe by'imvura zikomeye, haba mu turere cyangwa mu bihe by'umwaka, habaho ibihuha, ibihuha by'umusenyi, ibihuha by'amabuye y'amabuye, ibihuha by'umusenyi n'ibihuha by'umusenyi.

src: Travellers are strongly advised to be aware of any risk of severe weather affecting their area as they may affect any travel plans.
tgt: Abagenzi basabwa kwitondera cyane ibyago byose by'ibihe bibi bishobora kugira ingaruka ku karere batuyemo kuko bishobora kugira ingaruka ku migambi yabo yo gukora urugendo.

src: Anyone planning a visit to a country that could be considered a war zone should get professional training.
tgt: Umuntu wese wifuza gusura igihugu gishobora kubonwa nk'aho kiri mu ntambara, yagombye kwitoza ubuvuzi.

src: A search of the Internet for 'Hostile environment course' will probably provide the address of a local company.
tgt: Iyo ushakishije kuri interineti igitabo cyitwa 'Hostile Environment Course' ushobora kubona aderesi y'ikigo cyo muri ako karere.

src: A course will normally cover all the issues discussed here in far greater detail, usually with practical experience.
tgt: Muri rusange, amasomo azasuzuma mu buryo bwimbitse cyane ibibazo byose byasuzumwa hano, akenshi hakoreshejwe ibintu by'ingirakamaro umuntu yabonye.

src: A course will normally be from 2-5 days and will involve role play, a lot of first aid and sometimes weapons training.
tgt: Muri rusange, imyitozo izamara iminsi 2-5 kandi izagira uruhare mu gukina, ubutabazi bwinshi ndetse rimwe na rimwe n'imyitozo y'ibirwanisho.

src: Books and magazines dealing with wilderness survival are common, but publications dealing with war zones are few.
tgt: Ibitabo n'amagazeti bivuga ibihereranye no kurokoka mu butayu ni byinshi, ariko ibitabo bivuga ibihereranye n'ahantu habera intambara ni bike.

src: Voyagers planning sex reassignment surgery abroad must ensure they're carrying valid documents for the return trip.
tgt: Abatuye mu mahanga bafite gahunda yo kubagwa kugira ngo bahindure igitsina cyabo, bagomba kwemeza ko bafite impapuro z'inzira zikwiriye igihe bazaba basubiye mu gihugu.

src: The willingness of governments to issue passports with gender not stated (X) or documents updated to match a desired name and gender varies.
tgt: Ibyifuzo by'abategetsi byo gutanga impapuro z'inzira zitagaragaza ubwoko bw'igitsina (X) cyangwa inyandiko zigezweho kugira ngo zihwanye n'izina ryifuzwa n'ubwoko bw'igitsina bitandukaniye.

src: Willingness of foreign governments to honour these documents is just as widely variable.
tgt: Mu buryo nk'ubwo, ubushake bwa leta z'amahanga bwo kubahiriza izo nyandiko buratandukanye cyane.

src: Searches at security checkpoints have also become far more intrusive in the post-September 11, 2001 era.
tgt: Nanone kandi, nyuma y'itariki ya 11 Nzeri 2001, abantu bagiye barushaho kwibasirwa no gushakishwa mu bigo byigenga.

src: Pre-operative transgender people should not expect to pass through the scanners with their privacy and dignity intact.
tgt: Abantu bahindukiriye igitsina cyabo mbere yo kubagwa, ntibagomba kwitega ko bazajya bavurwa n'ibikoresho by'ikoranabuhanga mu gihe ubuzima bwabo bwite n'icyubahiro cyabo bitakiriho.

src: Rip currents are the returning flow from waves breaking off the beach, often at a reef or similar.
tgt: Amajyaruguru y'inyanja ni umugezi w'amazi uturuka ku nkombe z'inyanja, akenshi ugera ku nkombe z'inyanja cyangwa ahandi.

src: Due to the underwater topology the return flow is concentrated at a few deeper sections, and a fast current to deep water may form there.
tgt: Biturutse ku buryo bwo munsi y'amazi, urujya n'uruza rw'urujya n'uruza rugaragara mu bice bike cyane, kandi urujya n'uruza rw'urujya n'uruza rw'urujya n'uruza mu mazi ashyushye rushobora guturuka aho.

src: Most deaths happen as result of fatigue trying to swim back against the current, which may be impossible.
tgt: Abantu benshi bapfa bitewe n'uko barambiwe no kugerageza kuvana inyuma amazi, kandi ibyo bishobora kuba bitashoboka.

src: As soon as you get out of the current, swimming back is no more difficult than normally.
tgt: Iyo uvuye mu mazi, ntibikugora gusubirayo nk'uko bisanzwe.

src: Try aiming somewhere where you are not caught again or, depending on your skills and on whether you have been noticed, you might want to wait for rescue.
tgt: Gerageza kwerekeza aho utazongera kuboneka, cyangwa se, bitewe n'ubuhanga bwawe n'uko waba warabonetse cyangwa utabonetse, ushobora kwifuza kurindira ko hagira uwukizwa.

src: Re-entry shock comes on sooner than culture shock (there's less of a honeymoon phase), lasts longer, and can be more severe.
tgt: Guhangayika no kugaruka mu rugo bitangira vuba kurusha guhangayika n'imico y'iwacu (nta gihe kinini cy'ukwezi k'ubukwe), bikamara igihe kirekire kandi bishobora kuba bikomeye kurushaho.

src: Travellers who had an easy time adjusting to the new culture sometimes have a particularly hard time readjusting to their native culture.
tgt: Abashyitsi byarabagoraga kumenyera imico mishya, rimwe na rimwe biragoye cyane ko bamenya imico y'iwabo.

src: When returning home after living abroad, you've adapted to the new culture and lost some of your habits from your home culture.
tgt: Iyo ugeze mu gihugu cyawe nyuma yo kuba mu kindi gihugu, uba umaze kumenyera imico mishya kandi ukaba waratakaje imico imwe n'imwe y'iwawe.

src: When you went abroad at first, people were probably patient and understanding, knowing that travellers in a new country need to adapt.
tgt: Igihe watangiraga kujya mu kindi gihugu, abantu bashobora kuba baragutegetse kandi bakagutahura, kuko bari bazi ko abagendera mu kindi gihugu baba bagomba kumenyera imimerere.

src: People may not anticipate that patience and understanding are also necessary for travellers returning home.
tgt: Abantu bashobora kutatekereza ko kwihangana n'ubushishozi na byo ari iby'ingenzi ku bantu bari mu rugendo bagaruka mu gihugu cyabo.

src: The pyramid sound and light show is one of the most interesting things in the area for kids.
tgt: Igitaramo cy'amajwi n'umucyo cya pyramide ni kimwe mu bintu bishimishije cyane mu karere ku bana.

src: You can see the pyramids in the dark and you can see them in silence before the show begins.
tgt: Ushobora kubona za piramidi mu mwijima, kandi ushobora kuzisanga mu cyuho mbere y'uko igitaramo gitangira.

src: Usually you always here the sound of tourists and vendors. The story of the sound and light is just like a story book.
tgt: Akenshi wumva ijwi ry'abagenzi n'iry'abacuruzi.Ibyerekeye ijwi n'umucyo ni nk'igitabo cy'inkuru.

src: The Sphinx is set as the backdrop and the narrator of a long story.
tgt: Igishushanyo cya Sphinx kigaragazwa nk'ikintu cy'ibanze kandi nk'umwanditsi w'inkuru ndende.

src: The scenes are displayed on the pyramids and the different pyramids are lit up.
tgt: Ibyo bintu bigaragazwa ku mapiramide kandi amapiramide atandukanye agaragaramo umucyo.

src: South Shetland Islands, discovered in 1819, are claimed by several nations and have the most bases, with sixteen active in 2020.
tgt: Ibirwa bya Shetland y'Amajyepfo, byavumbuwe mu mwaka wa 1819, byatangajwe n'ibihugu byinshi kandi bifite ibirindiro byinshi kurusha ibindi, harimo icumi n'itandatu muri 2020.

src: The archipelago lies 120 km north of the Peninsula. The largest is King George Island with the settlement of Villa Las Estrellas.
tgt: Iki kirwa giherereye ku birometero 120 mu majyaruguru y'iki kirwa.Ikirwa kinini ni cya King George Island hamwe n'umujyi wa Villa Las Estrellas.

src: Others include Livingston Island, and Deception where the flooded caldera of a still-active volcano provides a spectacular natural harbour.
tgt: Hari n'ibindi birwa birimo Livingston Island na Deception, aho umugezi w'amazi w'umusozi w'ikirunga ukiriho, utuma habaho ikibuga cy'indege gitangaje.

src: Ellsworth Land is the region south of the Peninsula, bounded by the Bellingshausen Sea.
tgt: Igihugu cya Ellsworth ni umujyi wo mu majyepfo y'icyo kirwa, ugereranywa n'inyanja ya Bellingshausen.

src: The mountains of the Peninsula here merge into the plateau, then re-emerge to form the 360 km chain of the Ellsworth Mountains, bisected by the Minnesota Glacier.
tgt: Imisozi y'iki gice cy'inyanja iherekezwa n'umusozi, hanyuma ikongera kugaruka kugira ngo ibumbe urukurikirane rw'imisozi ya Ellsworth y'ibirometero 360, igabanijwe na Minnesota Glacier .

src: The northern part or Sentinel Range has Antarctica's highest mountains, the Vinson Massif, peaking at 4892 m Mount Vinson.
tgt: Igice cy'amajyaruguru cyangwa Sentinel Range gifite imisozi miremire cyane muri Antarctique, Vinson Massif, ifite uburebure bwa 4892 m Mount Vinson.

src: In remote locations, without cell phone coverage, a satellite phone may be your only option.
tgt: Mu turere tw'iburasirazuba, aho telefoni idashobora kugera, ushobora gukoresha telefone ya satellite gusa.

src: A satellite phone is not generally a replacement for a mobile phone, as you have to be outdoors with clear line of sight to the satellite to make a phone call.
tgt: Muri rusange, telefoni ikoreshwa mu buryo bw'ikoranabuhanga (satellite phone) ntishobora gusimbura telefone ngendanwa, kubera ko kugira ngo umuntu akoreshe telefone, aba agomba kuba ari hanze kandi abona neza isatelite.

src: The service is frequently used by shipping, including pleasure craft, as well as expeditions who have remote data and voice needs.
tgt: Iyi serivisi ikoreshwa cyane n'ubwato, harimo n'ubwato bwo kwidagadura, ndetse n'abakora ingendo z'ubukerarugendo bafite ibyo bakeneye by'amakuru n'amajwi.

src: Your local telephone service provider should be able to give more information about connecting to this service.
tgt: Umushoramari w'itumanaho wo mu karere k'iwawe yagombye kuguha ibindi bisobanuro ku birebana n'uko wakoresha iyo telefone.

src: An increasingly more popular option for those planning a gap-year is to travel and learn.
tgt: Ikindi kintu abantu benshi bifuza gukora mu mwaka w'ikiruhuko, ni ugufata ingendo kugira ngo biga.

src: This is especially popular with school leavers, allowing them to take a year out before university, without compromising their education.
tgt: Iyo gahunda ikundwa cyane n'abasiga amashuri, kuko ibaha umwaka wo kuruhuka mbere y'uko bajya muri za kaminuza, ariko ntibagire icyo bahindura ku masomo yabo.

src: In many cases, enrolling on a gap-year course abroad can actually improve your chances of moving into higher education back in your home country.
tgt: Mu by'ukuri, mu bihe byinshi, kujya kwiga mu kindi gihugu mu mwaka umwe, bishobora gutuma urushaho kugira amahirwe yo kujya kwiga amashuri yisumbuye mu gihugu cyawe.

src: Typically there will be a tuition fee to enroll in these educational programs.
tgt: Muri rusange, kugira ngo umuntu yinjire muri izo gahunda z'uburezi, aba agomba kwishyura amafaranga.

src: Finland is a great boating destination. The "Land of a thousand lakes" has thousands of islands too, in the lakes and in the coastal archipelagos.
tgt: Igihugu cya Finilande ni ahantu heza cyane abantu bajya mu bwato. "Igihugu cy'ibiyaga igihumbi" na cyo gifite ibirwa ibihumbi n'ibihumbi, biri mu biyaga no mu birwa biri ku nkombe zacyo.

src: In the archipelagos and lakes you do not necessarily need a yacht.
tgt: Iyo uri mu birwa no mu mazi, si ngombwa ko uba ufite ubwato.

src: Although the coastal archipelagos and the biggest lakes are indeed big enough for any yacht, smaller boats or even a kayak offer a different experience.
tgt: N'ubwo mu by'ukuri ibirwa byo ku nkombe z'inyanja n'ibiyaga binini by'inyanja ari binini bihagije kugira ngo ubwato ubwo ari bwo bwose bushobore kubikoramo, ubwato buto cyangwa mbere n'ubwato bwitwa kayak ni ibintu bishya.

src: Boating is a national pastime in Finland, with a boat to every seven or eight people.
tgt: Mu gihugu cya Finilande, abantu benshi bakunda kugendera mu bwato, kandi ku bantu barindwi cyangwa umunani, umwe aba afite ubwato.

src: This is matched by Norway, Sweden and New Zealand, but otherwise quite unique (e.g. in the Netherlands the figure is one to forty).
tgt: Ibi bigereranywa na Norvège, Suwede na Nouvelle-Zélande, ariko mu bindi bihugu usanga ari byo bidasanzwe (urugero mu Buholandi umubare ni umwe kuri mirongo ine).

src: Most of the distinct Baltic Cruises feature an extended stay in St. Petersburg, Russia.
tgt: Amato menshi atandukanye yo mu nyanja ya Baltique aba mu mujyi wa Saint-Pétersbourg wo mu Burusiya.

src: This means you can visit the historic city for a couple of full days while returning and sleeping on the ship at night.
tgt: Ibyo byumvikanisha ko ushobora gusura uwo mugi w'amateka iminsi ibiri yose, maze ugasubira mu bwato maze ugasinzira.

src: If you only go ashore using shipboard excursions you will not need a separate visa (as of 2009).
tgt: Niba ujya ku nkombe ukoresheje ingendo z'ubwato gusa, ntuzakenera visa (kuva mu 2009).

src: Some cruises feature Berlin, Germany in the brochures. As you can see from the map above Berlin is no where near the sea and a visit to the city is not included in the price of the cruise.
tgt: Nk'uko ushobora kubibona ku ikarita iri hejuru, umujyi wa Berlin nturi hafi y'inyanja, kandi gusura uwo mugi ntibikoreshwa mu mafaranga y'urugendo.

src: Travelling by plane can be a scary experience for people of all ages and backgrounds, particularly if they've not flown before or have experienced a traumatic event.
tgt: Kujya mu ndege bishobora gutera ubwoba abantu b'imyaka yose n'ubwoko bwose, cyane cyane niba batigeze bagendera mu ndege cyangwa niba hari ikintu kibi cyabagendekeye.

src: It is not something to be ashamed of: it is no different from the personal fears and dislikes of other things that very many people have.
tgt: Si ikintu cyo guterwa isoni: ntaho gihuriye n'ubwoba bw'umuntu ku giti cye no kwanga ibindi bintu abantu benshi cyane bafite.

src: For some, understanding something about how aircraft work and what happens during a flight may help to overcome a fear which is based on the unknown or on not being in control.
tgt: Ku bantu bamwe na bamwe, kumenya uko indege ikora n'ibyo iba ikora mu gihe iri mu ndege bishobora kubafasha gutsinda ubwoba bw'ibintu batazi cyangwa bwo kudashobora kubitegeka.

src: Courier companies are well paid for delivering things quickly. Frequently, time is very important with business documents, merchandise or spare parts for an urgent repair.
tgt: Akenshi, igihe ni ikintu cy'ingenzi cyane mu birebana n'ibitabo by'ubucuruzi, ibicuruzwa cyangwa ibice by'ibinyabiziga bigomba gukosorwa mu buryo bwihuse.

src: On some routes, the larger companies have their own planes, but for other routes and smaller firms there was a problem.
tgt: Ku mihanda imwe n'imwe, amakompanyi manini afite indege zayo bwite, ariko ku yindi mihanda n'amakompanyi manini, hari ikibazo.

src: If they sent things by air freight, on some routes it may have taken days to get through unloading and customs.
tgt: Niba batumizaga ibintu mu ndege, mu mihanda imwe n'imwe bishobora kuba byaratwaraga iminsi myinshi kugira ngo bigere aho bigarurwa no mu mirenge y'abinjira n'abasohoka.

src: The only way to get it through faster was to send it as checked luggage. Airline regulations will not allow them to send luggage without a passenger, which is where you come in.
tgt: Uburyo bwonyine bwo kuyisaba mu buryo bwihuse, ni uko yagombaga kuyitumiza nk'ibinyabiziga byemewe, kuko amategeko agenga indege ababuza kohereza ibinyabiziga bitagizwe n'umushoferi.

src: The obvious way of flying in first or business class is to fork out a thick wad of money for the privilege (or, better yet, get your company to do it for you).
tgt: Uburyo busanzwe bwo kugendera mu ndege mu cyiciro cya mbere cyangwa mu cyiciro cy'abacuruzi, ni ugutanga amafaranga menshi (cyangwa, icya ngombwa kurushaho, ni ukugira ngo ikompanyi yawe ikugire icyo gikorwa).

src: However, this does not come cheap: as rough rules of thumb, you can expect to pay up to four times the normal economy fare for business, and eleven times for first class!
tgt: Ariko kandi, ibyo ntibigutwara amafaranga make: nk'uko amategeko agenga ibintu abivuga, ushobora kwitega ko uzajya utanga amafaranga agera kuri ine ugereranyije n'ayajya mu ndege zisanzwe zo mu rwego rw'ubucuruzi, n'ibihumbi icumi n'ebyiri ugereranyije n'ayajya mu ndege zo mu rwego rwa mbere!

src: Generally speaking, there is no point in even looking for discounts for business or first-class seats on direct flights from A to B.
tgt: Mu by'ukuri, nta mpamvu yo gushakisha ibiciro by'ingendo z'indege zo mu cyiciro cy'ubucuruzi cyangwa mu cyiciro cya mbere, mu gihe ugiye mu cyiciro cya mbere.

src: Airlines know well that there is a certain core group of flyers who are willing to pay top dollar for the privilege of getting somewhere fast and in comfort, and charge accordingly.
tgt: Amashoramari y'indege azi neza ko hari itsinda ry'abantu bifuza kwishyura amafaranga menshi kugira ngo bagere ahantu runaka vuba kandi mu buryo bworoshye, kandi bakajya bayishyura hakurikijwe ibyo bashaka.

src: The capital of Moldova is Chişinău. The local language is Romanian, but Russian is widely used.
tgt: Umurwa mukuru wa Moldaviya ni Chişinău, kandi ururimi rukoreshwa muri icyo gihugu ni Ururomania, ariko ururimi rw'Ikirusiya ni rwo rukoreshwa cyane.

src: Moldova is a multi-ethnic republic that has suffered from ethnic conflict.
tgt: Igihugu cya Moldaviya kigizwe n'abantu b'amoko atandukanye, kandi cyagiye gihura n'intambara z'amoko.

src: In 1994, this conflict led to the creation of the self-proclaimed Transnistria Republic in eastern Moldova, which has its own government and currency but is not recognised by any UN member country.
tgt: Mu mwaka wa 1994, iyo ntambara yatumye mu burasirazuba bwa Moldaviya havuka Repubulika ya Transnistriya, ifite leta yayo n'amafaranga yayo, ariko nta gihugu na kimwe cy'umuryango w'abibumbye cyemera ko ari yo.

src: Economic links have been re-established between these two parts of Moldova despite the failure in political negotiations.
tgt: Ubufatanye mu by'ubukungu bwongeye gushyirwaho hagati y'ibi bice byombi bya Moldavie nubwo ibiganiro bya politiki byananiwe.

src: The major religion in Moldova is Orthodox Christian.
tgt: Idini ry'ibanze muri Moldaviya ni iy'Abakristo b'Aborutodogisi.

src: İzmir is the third largest city in Turkey with a population of around 3.7 million, the second biggest port after Istanbul, and a very good transport hub.
tgt: İzmir ni umujyi wa gatatu munini muri Turukiya ufite abaturage bagera kuri miliyoni 3.7, ikibuga cy'indege cya kabiri kinini nyuma ya Istanbul, ndetse n'umujyi mwiza wo gutwara abantu.

src: Once the ancient city of Smyrna, it is now a modern, developed, and busy commercial center, set around a huge bay and surrounded by mountains.
tgt: Icyo gihe cyahoze ari umujyi wa Smiruna, ariko ubu ukaba ari umujyi w'ubucuruzi wiganjemo abantu n'ibinyabuzima, ukikijwe n'umugezi munini kandi ukikijwe n'imisozi.

src: The broad boulevards, glass-fronted buildings and modern shopping centers are dotted with traditional red-tiled roofs, the 18th century market, and old mosques and churches, although the city has an atmosphere more of Mediterranean Europe than traditional Turkey.
tgt: Mu mihanda miremire, mu nyubako zifite ibyuma mu maso no mu tubari tw'ubu, haboneka inzu z'ubucuruzi zifite amabati y'ubwoko bwa kera, isoko ryo mu kinyejana cya 18, amasinagogi n'amatorero ya kera, n'ubwo muri uwo mujyi hari imimerere nk'iy'i Burayi bwo ku Nyanja ya Mediterane aho kuba nk'iy'i Turukiya yo muri iki gihe.

src: The village of Haldarsvík offer views of the nearby island Eysturoy and has an unusual octagonal church.
tgt: Mu mudugudu wa Haldarsvík haboneka ishyamba rya Eysturoy riri hafi aho, kandi hari n'itorero ryihariye rigizwe n'ibice umunani.

src: In the churchyard, there are interesting marble sculptures of doves over some tombs.
tgt: Mu rugo rw'iryo torero, hari ibishushanyo bishishikaje by'ibibabi byakozwe mu mabuye y'agaciro, biri hejuru y'imva zimwe.

src: It's worth half an hour to stroll about the intriguing village.
tgt: Gusuzugura uwo mudugudu utangaje bisaba igice cy'isaha.

src: To the north and within easy reach is the romantic and fascinating town of Sintra and which was made famous to foreigners after a glowing account of its splendours recorded by Lord Byron.
tgt: Mu majyaruguru hari umujyi w'icyamamare kandi ukundwa cyane wa Sintra, ukaba waravuzwe cyane n'abanyamahanga nyuma y'uko Lord Byron yanditse inkuru ishimishije ku bwiza bwawo.

src: Scotturb Bus 403 travels regularly to Sintra, stopping at Cabo da Roca.
tgt: Ibisi ya 403 ya Scotturb igenda i Sintra buri gihe, ihagarara i Cabo da Roca.

src: Also to the north visit the great Sanctuary of Our Lady of Fatima (Shrine), a place of worldwide famous Marian apparitions.
tgt: Nanone mu majyaruguru, nimugende mu Ngoro y'Umugore w'i Fatima (Shrine), ari na ho Mariya yagaragaye mu buryo bwihariye ku isi hose.

src: Please remember that you are essentially visiting a mass grave site, as well as a site that has an almost incalculable meaning to a significant portion of the world's population.
tgt: Ujye wibuka ko mu by'ukuri uri gusura imva y'abantu benshi, ndetse n'aho abantu benshi bo ku isi babona ko hari ikintu cy'ingenzi cyane.

src: There are still many men and women alive who survived their time here, and many more who had loved ones who were murdered or worked to death there, Jews and non-Jews alike.
tgt: Hari abagabo n'abagore benshi bakiriho barokotse igihe bari hano, kandi hari n'abandi benshi bari bafite ababo bishwe cyangwa bakorerwa imirimo kugeza bapfuye, Abayahudi n'abatari Abayahudi kimwe.

src: Please treat the site with all of the dignity, solemnity and respect it deserves. Do not make jokes about the Holocaust or Nazis.
tgt: Ndagusabye ko wafata uru rubuga nk'urw'icyubahiro, urw'icyubahiro n'urw'icyubahiro rwagombye.

src: Do not deface the site by marking or scratching graffiti into structures.
tgt: Ntugire icyo uhindura kuri uwo mubumbe mu gushyiriraho ibimenyetso cyangwa mu gushyiriraho amashusho mu mazu.

src: Barcelona's official languages are Catalan and Spanish. About a half prefer to speak Catalan, a vast majority understands it, and virtually everyone knows Spanish.
tgt: Abantu bagera kuri kimwe cya kabiri muri bo bakunda kuvuga ikikatalani, abenshi barayumva, kandi hafi buri wese azi icyesipanyoli.

src: However, most signs are indicated only in Catalan because it is established by law as the first official language.
tgt: Icyakora, ibimenyetso byinshi byerekana ururimi rw'Ikikatalani gusa kubera ko ari rwo rwemejwe n'amategeko ko ari rwo rurimi rw'ibanze rukoreshwa n'ubutegetsi.

src: Yet, Spanish is also widely used in public transport and other facilities.
tgt: Ariko kandi, ururimi rw'Icyesipanyoli rukoreshwa cyane no mu modoka zo gutwara abantu n'ibindi bikoresho.

src: Regular announcements in the Metro are made only in Catalan, but unplanned disruptions are announced by an automated system in a wide variety of languages including Spanish, English, French, Arabic and Japanese.
tgt: Ubutumwa bw'igihe cyose muri Metro butangwa mu rurimi rw'Ikataloniya gusa, ariko igihe habaye impanuka zitateganyijwe, butangazwa n'uburyo bw'ikoranabuhanga mu ndimi zitandukanye zirimo Icyespanyoli, Icyongereza, Igifaransa, Icyarabu n'Igiyapani.

src: Parisians have a reputation for being egocentric, rude and arrogant.
tgt: Abatuye i Paris bazwiho kuba abantu bitekerezaho gusa, b'abanyamujinya n'ab'ubwibone.

src: While this is often only an inaccurate stereotype, the best way to get along in Paris still is to be on your best behavior, acting like someone who is "bien élevé" (well brought up). It will make getting about considerably easier.
tgt: N'ubwo akenshi ibyo ari ibinyoma gusa, uburyo bwiza cyane bwo kubaho mu mujyi wa Paris ni ukwigenza neza, ukigenza nk'umuntu "bien élevé" (wizewe neza). Ibyo bizatuma ubuzima bukomera.

src: Parisians' abrupt exteriors will rapidly evaporate if you display some basic courtesies.
tgt: Abantu bo mu mujyi wa Paris barangwa n'imyifatire idahwitse, iyo ugaragaje imico imwe n'imwe yo mu rwego rw'ibanze, iyo mico yo mu buryo bw'umwuka izatinda guhinduka.

src: The Plitvice Lakes national park is heavily forested, mainly with beech, spruce, and fir trees, and features a mixture of Alpine and Mediterranean vegetation.
tgt: Pariki y'Ibirunga bya Plitvice irimo ibiti byinshi, cyane cyane ibiti byitwa beech, spruce, na fir, ndetse n'ibimera byo mu misozi ya Alpes na Mediterane.

src: It has a notably wide variety of plant communities, due to its range of microclimates, differing soils and varying levels of altitude.
tgt: Afite ubwoko butandukanye bw'ibimera, bitewe n'ubwoko bw'ibihe by'ikirere, ubutaka butandukanye n'uburebure butandukanye.

src: The area is also home to an extremely wide variety of animal and bird species.
tgt: Muri ako karere kandi hari ubwoko bwinshi cyane bw'inyamaswa n'inyoni.

src: Rare fauna such as the European brown bear, wolf, eagle, owl, lynx, wild cat and capercaillie can be found there, along with many more common species
tgt: Muri ako gace harimo inyamaswa zidakunze kuboneka, urugero nk'inuma y'i Burayi, ingwe, inyenzi, ingwe, imbwa zo mu ishyamba, n'izindi nyamaswa nyinshi zisanzwe

src: While visiting the monasteries, women are required to wear skirts covering the knees and have their shoulders covered, too.
tgt: Mu gihe bagendera mu mazu y'abapadiri, abagore basabwa kwambara imyenda ikingira amagufa ndetse n'amabega yabo.

src: Most of the monasteries do provide wraps for women who come unprepared, but if you bring your own, especially one with bright colors, you'll get a smile from the monk or nun at the entrance.
tgt: Amadini menshi y'abihayimana aha abagore baza batiteguye imyenda yo kwambara, ariko niba utwaye iyawe, cyane cyane iyo ifite amabara akomeye, abahayimana cyangwa abasaserdoti bazahagera bazaguteze akamwenyura.

src: Along the same line, men are required to wear trousers covering the knees.
tgt: Mu buryo nk'ubwo, abagabo na bo basabwa kwambara amapantalo ahisha amagufa.

src: This too can be borrowed from the stock at the entrance but that clothing isn't washed after every user so you may not feel comfortable wearing these skirts. One size fits all for men!
tgt: Ibyo na byo ushobora kubikodesha mu cyumba cy'inyuma y'inzu, ariko iyo myambaro ntisukuzwa nyuma y'uko uyikoresheje, bityo ukaba ushobora kumva udashimishijwe no kuyambara.

src: Majorcan cuisine, like that of similar zones in the Mediterranean, is based on bread, vegetables and meat (specially pork), and uses olive oil throughout.
tgt: Kimwe n'ahandi ho muri Mediterane, abantu b'i Majorque barya imigati, imbuto n'inyama (cyane cyane inyama z'ingurube), kandi bakoresha amavuta y'imyelayo.

src: A simple popular dinner, especially during the summer, is the Pa amb Oli: Bread with olive oil, tomato, and any available condiments such as cheese, tunafish, etc.
tgt: Ifunguro ry'umugoroba rikundwa cyane, cyane cyane mu gihe cy'impeshyi, ni rya Pa amb Oli: Umutsima w'amavuta y'imyelayo, tomati, n'ibishyimbo by'ubwoko ubwo ari bwo bwose, urugero nka cheese, tuna, n'ibindi.

src: All nouns, alongside the word Sie for you, always begin with a capital letter, even in the middle of a sentence.
tgt: Izina ryose, hamwe n'ijambo Sie rivuga wowe, buri gihe ritangirwa n'urwandiko runini, ndetse no hagati mu ngingo.

src: This is an important way to distinguish between some verbs and objects.
tgt: Iyo ni uburyo bw'ingenzi bwo gutandukanya imvugo zimwe na zimwe n'ibintu.

src: It also arguably makes reading easier, though writing is somewhat complicated by the need to find out whether a verb or adjective is used in a substantivized form.
tgt: Nanone kandi, bishobora gutuma gusoma byoroha, nubwo kwandika bitoroshye bitewe n'uko bisaba kumenya niba imvugo cyangwa ijambo ry'ikigereranyo rikoreshejwe mu buryo buhuje n'ibimenyetso.

src: Pronunciation is relatively easy in Italian since most words are pronounced exactly how they are written
tgt: Gukoresha icyitaliyani biroroshye kuko amagambo menshi akoreshwa nk'uko yandikwa

src: The main letters to watch out for are c and g, since their pronunciation varies based on the following vowel.
tgt: Ibimenyetso by'ibanze tugomba kwitondera ni c na g, kubera ko uburyo bivuga butandukanye bitewe n'umwimerere w'igisabo gikurikira.

src: Also, make sure to pronounce r and rr differently: caro means dear, whereas carro means chariot.
tgt: Nanone kandi, jya wirinda kuvuga r n'rr mu buryo butandukanye: caro bisobanuye nkunda, mu gihe carro bisobanura igare.

src: Persian has a relatively easy and mostly regular grammar.
tgt: Igiperesi gifite indangagaciro zisanzwe kandi zitoroshye.

src: Therefore, reading this grammar primer would help you learn much about Persian grammar and understand phrases better.
tgt: Ku bw'ibyo rero, gusoma icyo gitabo kizagufasha kumenya byinshi ku birebana n'indangagaciro z'Igiperesi no gusobanukirwa neza amagambo.

src: Needless to say, if you know a Romance language, it will be easier for you to learn Portuguese.
tgt: Nta gushidikanya ko niba uzi ururimi rw'Ikiromaniya, kwiga Igiporutugali bizaba byoroshye.

src: However, people who know a little Spanish may hastily conclude that Portuguese is close enough that it need not be studied separately.
tgt: Ariko kandi, abantu bazi icyesipanyoli gato, bashobora kwihutira gutekereza ko icy'Igiporutugali gihuje n'icy'Icyesipanyoli, ku buryo atari ngombwa ko bakigishwa by'umwihariko.

src: Pre-modern observatories are usually obsolete today, and remain as museums, or sites of education.
tgt: Amashami y'ubushakashatsi yakoreshwaga mbere y'igihe cya none, muri iki gihe akenshi ntiyakoreshwa, kandi aracyakoreshwa nk'amazu y'ibitabo by'amateka, cyangwa ahantu h'uburezi.

src: As light pollution in their heyday was not the kind of problem it is today, they are usually located in cities or at campuses, easier to reach than those built in modern times.
tgt: Kubera ko mu gihe cy'ubukungu bw'ibyo bigo by'amashuri ubutaka bwanduzwaga n'umucyo bitari ikibazo nk'icyo muri iki gihe, akenshi byubakwaga mu mijyi cyangwa mu bigo by'amashuri, bikaba byoroshye kugeraho kurusha ibi byubatswe muri iki gihe.

src: Most modern research telescopes are enormous facilities in remote areas with favorable atmospheric conditions.
tgt: Teleskopi nyinshi zo muri iki gihe zo gukora ubushakashatsi ziri mu turere tw'amajyaruguru dufite ikirere cyiza cyane.

src: Cherry blossom viewing, known as hanami, has been a part of Japanese culture since the 8th century.
tgt: Guhera mu kinyejana cya munani, abantu bo mu Buyapani bagiraga umuco wo kureba amarenga y'ibishyimbo byitwa hanami (hanami).

src: The concept came from China where plum blossoms were the flower of choice.
tgt: Icyo gitekerezo cyaturutse mu Bushinwa, aho amashurwe y'ibishyimbo yabaga ari yo yatorwaga.

src: In Japan, the first cherry blossom parties were hosted by the emperor only for himself and other members of the aristocracy around the Imperial Court.
tgt: Mu Buyapani, umwami w'abami n'abandi bantu bo mu nzego z'icyubahiro bari hafi y'Ingoro y'Umwami w'abami ni bo bonyine bateraniraga ibirori bya mbere by'ibirori by'ibishyimbo.

src: Plants look their best when in a natural environment, so resist the temptation to remove even "just one" specimen.
tgt: Ku bw'ibyo, jya wirinda ibishuko byo kubikuraho, kabone n'iyo byaba "ikintu kimwe".

src: If visiting a formally arranged garden, collecting "specimens" is also going to get you ejected, without discussion.
tgt: Niba ugiye mu busitani bwubatswe mu buryo bwemewe n'amategeko, gutoranya "ibikoresho" na byo bishobora gutuma wirukanwa mu busitani, nta n'icyo uganiraho.

src: Singapore is generally an extremely safe place to be and very easy to navigate, and you can buy almost anything after arriving.
tgt: Singapore muri rusange ni ahantu hatekanye cyane kandi ho kugenderaho biroroshye, kandi ushobora kugura hafi ya buri kintu cyose umaze kugerayo.

src: But being placed in the "high tropics" just a few degrees north of equator you will need to deal with both heat (always) and strong sun (when the sky is clear, more rarely).
tgt: Ariko kandi, kubera ko uba mu "bihugu by'ubushyuhe" biri mu majyaruguru y'akarere k'ibiyaga bigari, uzaba ukeneye guhangana n'ubushyuhe (buri gihe) n'izuba rikomeye (igihe ikirere kirimo ikirere cyiza, ariko bikaba ari gake cyane).

src: There are also a few buses going north to Hebron, the traditional burial place of the Biblical patriarchs Abraham, Isaac, Jacob, and their wives.
tgt: Hari n'imodoka nke zigenda mu majyaruguru zigana i Heburoni, aho mu buryo bw'imigenzo, ba sekuruza b'imiryango bavugwa muri Bibiliya ari bo Aburahamu, Isaka, Yakobo, hamwe n'abagore babo, barashyingurwa.

src: Check that the bus you are thinking of taking goes into Hebron and not just to the nearby Jewish settlement of Kiryat Arba.
tgt: Jya ugenzura niba bisi wifuza kugenderaho ijya i Heburoni, aho kujya gusa mu mugi w'Abayahudi wa Kiriyati-Arba wari hafi aho.

src: Inland waterways can be a good theme to base a holiday around.
tgt: Inzira z'amazi zo mu gihugu zishobora kuba intangiriro nziza yo kwizihizaho iminsi mikuru.

src: For example visiting castles in the Loire Valley, the Rhine valley or taking a cruise to interesting cites on the Danube or boating along the Erie Canal.
tgt: Urugero, ni ugusura inyubako zo mu kibaya cya Loire, cyangwa mu kibaya cya Rhine, cyangwa se kugendera mu bwato mu mijyi ishishikaje yo mu kibaya cya Danube, cyangwa se kugendera mu bwato mu kibaya cya Erie Canal.

src: They also define routes for popular hiking and cycling trails.
tgt: Nanone kandi, zigaragaza imihanda abantu bakunda kugenda n'amaguru cyangwa ku magare.

src: Christmas is one of the most important holidays of Christianity, and is celebrated as the birthday of Jesus.
tgt: Noheli ni imwe mu minsi mikuru y'ingenzi cyane y'Abakristo, kandi ihimbazwa nk'umunsi w'ivuka rya Yezu.

src: Many of the traditions surrounding the holiday have been adopted also by non-believers in Christian countries and non-Christians around the world.
tgt: Imigenzo myinshi y'iyi minsi mikuru yakwirakwijwe n'abatemera bo mu bihugu by'Abakristo n'abatari Abakristo bo ku isi hose.

src: There's a tradition to pass the Easter night awake at some exposed point to see the sunrise.
tgt: Hari umugenzo wo kumara ijoro ryo kwizihiza Pasika batasinziriye ahantu hari umucyo kugira ngo barebe izuba rirashe.

src: There are of course Christian theological explanations for this tradition, but it may well be a pre-Christian Spring and Fertility ritual.
tgt: Birumvikana ko hari ibisobanuro bya tewolojiya ya Gikristo ku birebana n'iyi migenzo, ariko ishobora kuba yari umugenzo wakorwaga mbere y'Ubukristo mu gihe cy'impeshyi no mu gihe cy'imvura.

src: More traditional churches often hold an Easter Vigil on Saturday night during the Easter weekend, with the congregations often breaking into celebration at the stroke of midnight to celebrate Christ's resurrection.
tgt: Amatorero yo mu buryo bw'imigenzo akenshi akora Igisibo cya Pasika ku mugoroba wo ku wa Gatandatu mu mpera z'icyumweru cya Pasika, kandi amatorero akenshi agatangira kwizihiza mu gicuku cyo hagati kugira ngo bizihire umuzuko wa Kristo.

src: All animals that originally arrived in the islands came here either by swimming, flying or floating.
tgt: Inyamaswa zose zageze ku birwa by'i Guinée na Guinée-Bissau, zabyozaga, ziguruka mu ndege cyangwa zikajya mu mazi.

src: Due to the long distance from the continent mammals were unable to make the journey making the giant tortoise the primary grazing animal in the Galapagos.
tgt: Ku bw'iyo ntera y'amajyaruguru, inyamaswa zo mu bwoko bw'inyamaswa zo mu bwoko bw'inyamaswa zo mu bwoko bw'inyamaswa zo mu bwoko bw'inyamaswa zo mu bwoko bw'inyamaswa zo mu bwoko bw'inyamaswa zo mu bwoko bw'inyamaswa zo mu bwoko bw'inyamaswa zo muri Galapagos.

src: Since the arrival of man to the Galapagos, many mammals have been introduced including goats, horses, cows, rats, cats and dogs.
tgt: Kuva abantu bageze muri Galapagos, bazanye inyamaswa nyinshi z'amabere, urugero nk'impene, amafarashi, inka, impene, amakoti n'imbwa.

src: If you visit the Arctic or Antarctic areas in the winter you will experience the polar night, which means that the sun doesn't rise above the horizon.
tgt: Iyo ugeze mu turere twa Arctique cyangwa Antarctique mu gihe cy'imbeho, ushobora kubona ijoro ry'i Nyanja y'Iburasirazuba n'iy'Iburasirazuba, ibyo bikaba bisobanura ko izuba ridahaguruka.

src: This offers a good opportunity to see the Aurora borealis, as the sky will be dark more or less around the clock.
tgt: Ibyo bitanga uburyo bwiza bwo kubona Aurora borealis, kubera ko ikirere kizaba kimeze nk'icyuzuye umwijima umunsi wose.

src: As the areas are sparsely populated, and light pollution therefore often not a problem, you will also be able to enjoy the stars.
tgt: Kubera ko muri iyo mihanda nta bantu benshi babaho, kandi kubera ko mu gihe cy'imvura nta kibazo gihari, nawe uzashobora kwishimira kureba inyenyeri.

src: Japanese work culture is more hierarchical and formal that what Westerners may be used to.
tgt: Imico yo mu Buyapani mu birebana n'akazi irangwa n'urwego rw'ubuyobozi n'imyitwarire, kurusha uko abantu bo mu Burengerazuba bashobora kuba bamenyereye.

src: Suits are standard business attire, and coworkers call each other by their family names or by job titles.
tgt: Imyambaro ni imyambaro ikoreshwa cyane mu kazi, kandi abo bakorana bahinduranya amazina y'imiryango yabo cyangwa amazina y'imirimo.

src: Workplace harmony is crucial, emphasizing group effort rather than praising individual accomplishments.
tgt: Kugira ubumwe ku kazi ni iby'ingenzi, ugashingira ku bikorwa by'itsinda aho gushima ibyo buri wese yakoze.

src: Workers must often get their superiors' approval for any decisions they make, and are expected to obey their superiors' instructions without question.
tgt: Akenshi abakozi baba bagomba kwemererwa n'abakuru babo ku birebana n'imyanzuro iyo ari yo yose bafata, kandi biteganyijwe ko bagomba kumvira amabwiriza ya bakuru babo badafite icyo babaza.
